['', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'General Requirements:', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Job Description:', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.']

['Core Responsibilities Will Include:', 'Build production-ready models using data from Understory’s networks', 'Incorporate new findings with current weather models to improve them', 'Dental and vision benefits 100% covered for your entire family', 'Experience in algorithm development with Python, Matlab, R regression analysis, cohort analysis, clustering, predictive models, and machine learning', 'Compensation Includes', 'Familiarity with state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms', 'Master’s in mathematics, computer science, finance, economics, or science-related field, or equivalent professional experience', 'Company equity', 'When severe weather strikes, Understory detects it and triggers a fast, predetermined payout. There are no burdensome financial deductibles, and no lengthy claims process. Ultimately, Understory allows capital to quickly flow where it’s needed most after a disaster, protecting everything from automobiles to the world’s food supply.', 'Experience with information retrieval and geospatial analysis fundamentals', 'Frequent company and team-building events', 'Understory is the first company to solve the insurance coverage crisis with data-driven insurance for severe weather, starting with hail. Yet traditional insurers lack the tools to accurately assess and price severe weather risk. Without knowing what to expect, insurers expect the worst, leading to unaffordable premiums. ", ' Group 1: June 28, 2021 ', ' Understanding traveler booking preference is the key to provide efficient matches between travelers and partners. This\u202fproject leveraged both NLP and ML techniques to extract valuable information from\u202f traveler \u202freviews. By transforming the unstructured data into structured understanding of traveler preferences, it will enable us to enhance listing valuation models, help us identify real competitions among listings and make effective supply\u202facquisition\u202fdecisions.\u202f \u202f ', 'Who You Are', ' Our pricing data science team solves a multi-objective optimization function in the two-sided marketplace to algorithmically identify the best prices to drive more transactions, creating a multi-item trip price incentive for the users and increased transactions for the suppliers. This is done by creating prediction models for various key performance indices. These predictions come with errors and can result in suboptimal solutions for the optimization. In this project, we aim to first investigate the Neural network dropout based uncertainty estimation technique and then use it create a robust optimization framework that can solve the multi-objective optimization function more accurately, leading to improved pricing for both the users and the suppliers. ', ' Spark/ PySpark , MLlib , TensorFlow, Keras , PyTorch , Caffe, Python ML libs (Pandas, Matplotlib, Scipy , Sklearn , Numpy etc)  Nice-to-have: Hive, Hadoop, Microsoft SQL Server ', ' Apply solid coding skills, strong analytical and innovative thinking, and Machine Learning expertise to quickly learn new domains and turn innovative ideas into working solutions (from the London Document) ', ' Spark/ PySpark , MLlib , TensorFlow, Keras , PyTorch , Caffe, Python ML libs (Pandas, Matplotlib, Scipy , Sklearn , Numpy etc) ', ' You understand distributed file systems, scalable datastores, distributed computing and related technologies (Spark, Hadoop, etc.); implementation experience of MapReduce techniques, in-memory data processing, etc. ', ' Group 1: June 28, 2021  Group 2: August 23, 2021 ', ' Machine Learning Engineer:  Ideal candidate enjoys building ML systems and cares about software engineering principles like CD/CI and code stability, while productionizing machine learning models. PhD degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., biomedical engineering, computer science, applied mathematics or similar) or equivalent practical experience.', 'Iterate on and build new models from wearable sensors using a combination of physical modeling, signal processing and machine learning approaches.', 'Preferred qualifications:']

Your goal will be to shape and build efficient self-learning applications by designing and building web scale distributed systems.', 'Please apply to learn more about this great opportunity!', 'Present findings and products to team and other members of leadership frequently.', "At Eight Eleven, our business is people. Relationships are at the center of what we do. A successful partnership is only as strong as the relationship built. We're your trusted partner for IT hiring, recruiting, and staffing needs.", 'Responsibilities:', 'Work closely with a team of engineers and researchers to collect and analyze data, design solutions, and evaluate products.', 'Work closely with a team of engineers and researchers to collect and analyze data, design solutions, and evaluate products.Perform automation of test cases using PyTorch/Python.Present findings and products to team and other members of leadership frequently.Design and develop appropriate test automation frameworks and data validation techniques to ensure optimized product performance', 'Coding experience using Python, PyTorch, Git Hub, or Tensorflow', "For over 16 years, Eight Eleven has established and maintained relationships that are designed to meet your IT staffing needs. That's the Eight Eleven promise.", 'About Eight Eleven:', '*not remote - willing to relocate']

With the sheer scale of Walmart’s environment comes the biggest of big data sets. As a Walmart Data Engineer, you will dig into our mammoth scale of data to help unleash the power of retail data science by imagining, developing, and maintaining data pipelines that our Data Scientists and Analysts can rely on . way.\u202fYou will partner with Data Scientists, Analysts, other engineers and business stakeholders to solve complex and exciting challenges so that we can build out capabilities that evolve the retail business model while making a positive impact on our customers’ lives.\u202f\u202fYou’ll Make An Impact ByUsing data integration techniques to build refined, high impact data sets from complex challenges, so that we can optimize and scale algorithms Identifying, developing and delivering improvements on data performance, data quality and cost Staying current through continual research and ['', 'Position Requirements', 'Physical Requirements', 'Knowledge, Skills, Abilities:', '\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.', "You 'Matter to Us'\xa0Our diverse team at Jefferson Lab includes more than 700 people, comprising physicists, engineers, computer professionals, technicians and more. From probing the basic building blocks of matter to performing advanced computing and applied research, we are on the leading edge of science and technology. If you are looking for a great job in a unique place where your contributions truly matter, consider Jefferson Lab!", 'Essential Job Functions:\xa0', '\xa0', 'Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.Must possess good written and oral communication skills.Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.', 'Education and Experience:', 'Jefferson Science Associates, LLC (JSA) manages and operates the Thomas Jefferson National Accelerator Facility (Jefferson Lab). JSA is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in hiring or employment on the basis of race, color, religion, ethnicity, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, age, disability, or veteran status or on any other basis prohibited by federal, state, or local law. As part of the JSA’s equal employment opportunity policy, we also take affirmative action as called for by applicable laws and Executive Orders to ensure that minority group individuals, females, disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, other protected veterans, Armed Forces, and qualified disabled persons are introduced into our workforce and considered for promotional opportunities.', 'Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', 'Employment with JSA is conditional upon DOE approval if at any time during your employment you are participating in a Foreign Government Talent Recruitment Program. Generally, such programs include any foreign-state-sponsored attempt to acquire U.S.-funded scientific research through programs run or funded by the government that target scientists, engineers, academics, researchers, and entrepreneurs of all nationalities working or educated in the United States.', 'Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0', 'Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', 'We are currently seeking a Streaming Data Scientist..\xa0', 'Must possess good written and oral communication skills.', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0', 'Jefferson Lab seeks a new team member at the level of a Staff Computer Scientist III for the Experimental Physics Software and Computing Infrastructure (EPSCI) group in the Computational Science and Technology (CST) division. As a member of EPSCI, the candidate will help develop systems utilizing the latest software, computing, and networking technologies to help advance the scientific program of the lab. We are seeking excellent candidates with knowledge/experience in streaming data transport to design and implement systems to meet the challenges of future scientific experiments to match computational resources to their larger size and scope. These include the 12GeV Experimental Nuclear Physics program currently underway and future science programs under development. The successful candidate will focus on research activities and developing data transport tools for streaming readout data acquisition systems as well as post-acquisition data processing. Duties will include working with scientists at Jefferson Lab and partner institutions to develop such tools and provide expert advice on their implementation. Applicants must be able to work with a small group of subject matter experts, have good communication skills, and relevant technical knowledge.', 'Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.', 'Mental Requirements', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.', 'Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Physical Sciences plus 10 years of relevant experience', 'SALARY RANGE: $103,200 - $163,200 (SS III)', 'Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0', 'Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'POSITION POSTED: AUGUST 11, 2020']

digital experiences to serve them. You will be joining a new\xa0digital\xa0organization within AB InBev consisting of\xa0digital strategy,\xa0product, design, analytics, operations and engineering. This organization is responsible for building the products and platforms that transform our traditional sales operations across the world.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Working with the Data Engineering team to scope out upstream data and pipeline requirements to maintain model', 'Experience working with analytics packages (numpy, scipy pandas, sklearn, mllib)', 'Foundational understanding of, and experience applying classical machine learning techniques (supervised, unsupervised) to noisy data', 'Experience with data visualization tools (Looker, Retool)', 'Create and maintain your own algorithms', 'Work fluidly across ABI’s global and local\xa0teams\xa0and functions (sales, finance, marketing, product, IT,\xa0etc.) to make data-driven\xa0initiatives\xa0successful\xa0in an efficient way', 'At AB InBev, we believe the best models and solutions are data driven and built iteratively and collaboratively with all parts of our business. On any given day, your role spans doing a high level presentation to a senior executive to get buy-in to flying to our many international markets around the world to see why a certain model is not performing as well as expected in the field. You will be at the forefront of our journey towards transforming our traditional operations into a digital, data driven business.', 'BA/BS degree\xa0in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Math, Physics, Statistics, Operations Research, or similar technical field) with\xa02+\xa0years of work experience\xa0required', 'Executing against the roadmap, working cross-functionally with our internal team', 'Building out all the analysis and modeling work necessary to drive towards a solution', 'As a Global Manager, eCommerce Data Scientist, you work with AB InBev’s massive, multinational internal and external data sources to bring value to our core business. You will be working closely with our global Revenue Management & Commercial team to define problems, possible solutions, and KPIs based on their knowledge of the business and the unique markets AB InBev operates in. You will build out and execute on a roadmap to solve specific business problems, working with our product management, core technology, and data engineering teams to bring your solutions to life. ', '\xa0', 'The successful candidate will be a key member of a small team of investment professionals where you will take full ownership of the data science work involving alternative data in your chosen sector (sector agnostic) and work in tandem with Portfolio Managers to build out full data projects that will provide actionable investment insights. ', 'BS/MS/PhD in a hard science such as math, statistics, computer science, economics and/or engineering Work experience at another hedge fund in the area of quantitative research/analysis or data science. Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'Role Responsibilities: ', 'Experience in Portfolio Analytics, Risk Modeling, and Portfolio Construction a plus ', 'The position requires both a strong quantitative/technical skill set in additional to an understanding/familiarity with the fundamental investment process as well (equities is preferred, but asset class experience is open). ", ' Group 1: June 28, 2021 ', ' Understanding traveler booking preference is the key to provide efficient matches between travelers and partners. This\u202fproject leveraged both NLP and ML techniques to extract valuable information from\u202f traveler \u202freviews. By transforming the unstructured data into structured understanding of traveler preferences, it will enable us to enhance listing valuation models, help us identify real competitions among listings and make effective supply\u202facquisition\u202fdecisions.\u202f \u202f ', 'Who You Are', ' Our pricing data science team solves a multi-objective optimization function in the two-sided marketplace to algorithmically identify the best prices to drive more transactions, creating a multi-item trip price incentive for the users and increased transactions for the suppliers. This is done by creating prediction models for various key performance indices. These predictions come with errors and can result in suboptimal solutions for the optimization. In this project, we aim to first investigate the Neural network dropout based uncertainty estimation technique and then use it create a robust optimization framework that can solve the multi-objective optimization function more accurately, leading to improved pricing for both the users and the suppliers. ['', 'Role: Lead Data Scientist', 'Local DC area startup with deep connections, partnerships with everyone from AWS to Microsoft, and major active projects that is architecting and building software as well as hardware products that enable privacy-as-a-service in an online always connected world. ['', "Find purpose in your career!\xa0The Asbury Group Integrated Technologies is an IT consulting arm of Asbury Communities, Inc.\xa0completely focused on doing all the good we can for those we serve.\xa0When you join our family, you'll enjoy the personal fulfillment that comes from making a difference in someone's life every day.\xa0Asbury\xa0is honored to have earned certification as a Great Place to Work for three years in a row based on associate feedback\xa0to questions related to trust, culture, and the meaning they derive from their jobs.", 'We are currently seeking talented and highly motivated Data Scientists or Data Engineers to lead in the development of our discovery and support platform. The successful candidate will join a small, global team of data focused associates that have successfully built, and maintained a best of class traditional, Kimball based, SQL server founded, data warehouse.\xa0The successful candidate will lead the conversion of the existing data structure into an AWS focused, big data framework and assist in identifying and pipelining existing and augmented data sets into this environment.\xa0In addition, the successful candidate will assist leadership in growing the team required to complete the development of various computational algorithms associated with aging in place.\xa0The successful candidate can be either data engineering or science focused but must be able to lead and assist in architecting and constructing the AWS foundation and initial data ports.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Contact us to learn more about this fantastic opportunity!', 'Ensuring that we provide a safe and healthy environment for those who work and live at our communities is our highest priority.\xa0We are proud of the incredible work being done by our associates and grateful for the support we are receiving from our many residents and family members as we work through this pandemic together.\xa0We continue to aggressively work to minimize the risks of the COVID-19 virus for\xa0residents and associates in our communities.']

['', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'In this role, you will help our team interpret the performance data gathered from our write and read pipelines with statistical analysis and modeling.\xa0', 'Experience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'Develop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questions', 'What you want:', 'Experience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languages', 'Experience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0', 'Develop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computing', 'The challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistry', 'Apply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecks', 'Define and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelines', 'What we need:', 'Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning framework', 'An MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related field', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writer', 'What you will do:', 'At Catalog, we value perseverance, leadership, teamwork, science, and communication. You will have the opportunity to shape the future of an entirely new way of manipulating information. You will have a chance to formulate and solve challenging computing problems arising in this uncharted territory. You will have a chance to work and learn with a team of talented scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs, and a chance to wear multiple hats and grow with us.\xa0', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological dataExperience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languagesExperience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning frameworkExcellent oral and written communication skillsAn MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related fieldExperience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'Communicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological data', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelinesDevelop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questionsDevelop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computingDefine and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelinesApply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecksCommunicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'An opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computing', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelines', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writerAn opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computingThe challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistryA culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environmentResponsibility, leadership, and trust', 'We hope that you will consider joining us for a chat; we promise it will be intriguing.', 'A culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environment', 'Responsibility, leadership, and trust', "At Catalog, we are building the world's first massive data storage and computing platform using DNA as the storage medium. As an information storage medium, DNA is unique in its stability over millennia (think fossils), information density (gigabits in a cellular volume), and replicability (billions of copies, made cheaply and efficiently). Among its many groundbreaking applications, these properties make DNA an attractive medium for high density storage of latency tolerant data and massively parallel computation. To this end, we are developing a novel exabyte-scale DNA computing platform and looking for motivated engineers to join us."]

job_title: Head of Data Science and Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Work in close partnership with the software engineering leadership to determine the most effective ways to farm data and develop a scalable architecture for managing the data pipeline and infrastructure ', 'Passionate to innovate solutions, delight users, and inspire colleagues ', 'Define and drive the strategy for investments, working closely with key business analytics leaders, and executive management ', '15+ years of experience in managing, and mentoring data science, data engineering, and analytics teams in a global technology company ', 'Equal Opportunity: Cricut is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and members. Applicants will be considered based on their qualifications and without regards to age, race, ethnicity, gender identity or expression, national origin, religion, physical or mental disability, protected veteran states, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation or any other protected characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations or ordinances. ', 'Develop an investment strategy to define, grow and maintain an exemplary data management organization ', 'Support an organizational effort towards better understanding user behavior, needs and pain points, and propose roles that data science can play to further this goal ', 'Commitment to values that align with Cricut’s overarching mission and principles ', 'Deep technical background in applied data science, spanning some or all of statistics, experimentation, machine learning, causal methods, optimization techniques, data engineering and architecture (applied to large data), and behavioral analytics. ', 'Strong interpersonal skills and ability to influence through partnerships ', 'Qualifications', 'Develop and implement strategies to support ongoing data management needs, such as governance, technology shifts, and regulatory compliance changes ', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Physics, Operations Research, etc. ', 'Determine how to leverage data science, machine learning, and other analytical techniques to offer actionable insights both internally & externally ', 'Equal Opportunity: Cricut is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and members. Applicants will be considered based on their qualifications and without regards to age, race, ethnicity, gender identity or expression, national origin, religion, physical or mental disability, protected veteran states, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation or any other protected characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations or ordinances. ADA: If you require reasonable accommodation during the application or selection process please do not hesitate to reach out to Cricut HR or your assigned recruiter.', 'Strong strategic business acumen, and continuous improvement champion ', 'Deep technical background in applied data science, spanning some or all of statistics, experimentation, machine learning, causal methods, optimization techniques, data engineering and architecture (applied to large data), and behavioral analytics. M.S. or Ph.D. in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Physics, Operations Research, etc. 15+ years of experience in managing, and mentoring data science, data engineering, and analytics teams in a global technology company Technical publications and ties to academic communities are a plus. Skilled at operating in a complex, cross-functional organization where your teams need to collaborate and integrate with other teams across many disciplines. Passionate to innovate solutions, delight users, and inspire colleagues Commitment to values that align with Cricut’s overarching mission and principles Strong strategic business acumen, and continuous improvement champion Strong interpersonal skills and ability to influence through partnerships Excellent written and verbal communication skills ', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills ', 'Collaborate with cross-functional partners in product, engineering, design, content, operations, finance, and marketing to define and build data-informed business strategy and roadmaps ', 'Ensure data best practices and play a critical role in building a data-driven culture throughout Cricut; Be a thought leader and evangelist to drive adoption and data knowledge and fluency at all levels of the organization ', 'Participate heavily with Cricut’s executive team, help set business strategy, represent product data science, initiate and debate key strategic topics and opportunities from your team’s work, and drive bold high-impact decisions ', 'Build a high performance, responsive team of data scientists, data engineers, and analysts who are able to harvest and synthesize data quickly and accurately ', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Job Description', 'Technical publications and ties to academic communities are a plus. ', 'Skilled at operating in a complex, cross-functional organization where your teams need to collaborate and integrate with other teams across many disciplines. ', 'Build a high performance, responsive team of data scientists, data engineers, and analysts who are able to harvest and synthesize data quickly and accurately Develop an investment strategy to define, grow and maintain an exemplary data management organization Support an organizational effort towards better understanding user behavior, needs and pain points, and propose roles that data science can play to further this goal Ensure data best practices and play a critical role in building a data-driven culture throughout Cricut; Be a thought leader and evangelist to drive adoption and data knowledge and fluency at all levels of the organization Determine how to leverage data science, machine learning, and other analytical techniques to offer actionable insights both internally & externally Work in close partnership with the software engineering leadership to determine the most effective ways to farm data and develop a scalable architecture for managing the data pipeline and infrastructure Develop and implement strategies to support ongoing data management needs, such as governance, technology shifts, and regulatory compliance changes Define and drive the strategy for investments, working closely with key business analytics leaders, and executive management Participate heavily with Cricut’s executive team, help set business strategy, represent product data science, initiate and debate key strategic topics and opportunities from your team’s work, and drive bold high-impact decisions Collaborate with cross-functional partners in product, engineering, design, content, operations, finance, and marketing to define and build data-informed business strategy and roadmaps ', 'ADA: If you require reasonable accommodation during the application or selection process please do not hesitate to reach out to Cricut HR or your assigned recruiter.']

['', 'About the Job', 'With a range of formats including live online training courses, interactive tutorials, books, videos, and case studies, we equip all members of the workforce with the insight they need to stay ahead in an ever-changing economy.', 'Experience with how to design features for use in a linear model and/or a neural network to achieve specific predictive outcomes.', "O’Reilly Media’s Search and Personalization Platform Engineering team supports O’Reilly’s premier learning service by building out personalization systems built on data and machine learning to provide a unique and dynamic experience for all of our users. The O'Reilly Learning Platform is used by technologists, managers, and designers around the world to hone their skills and improve their craft. O'Reilly's personalization team is one of many small teams that are broadly distributed across the US, featuring diverse, tightly collaborative groups of developers, designers, and product managers constantly encouraging each other to deliver work that instills pride and fulfillment. We encourage learning, knowledge sharing, growth and collaboration in all aspects.", 'TensorFlow / DNNs and Language Models', 'Experience with big data systems like Hadoop, Spark, Beam, HBase, etc.', "A bachelor's degree in a math focused discipline, or equivalent real world experience", 'Something we’ve been doing for over 40 years.', 'Finagle, GCP, Apache BeamDocker + Kubernetes', 'About the Team', 'In this role you will be primarily building data processing systems and developing machine learning models to provide intelligent predictions that are used within the search and personalization team or\xa0other internal teams to drive improved learning outcomes across the platform. In addition to building models, you will also be responsible for building and maintaining web services that provide search and personalization services to our users. This can include building apis, managing search engines, as well as building any other systems required to meet our goals.', 'Finagle, GCP, Apache Beam', 'Experience working with a modern data science / statistics platform such as scikit, R, SAS, matlab or similar.', 'At O’Reilly our engineers focus on building a diverse set of features designed in collaboration with product managers, UX and other teammates. Engineers work with product managers to refine direction and solve user problems, exchange code reviews with other team members, provide mentorship to junior engineers, and assist QA and Ops in troubleshooting product issues.', 'Experience with big data systems like Hadoop, Spark, Beam, HBase, etc.Strong data structure and algorithm knowledgeTensorFlow / DNNs and Language Models', 'O’Reilly Media has been inspiring the future for more than 40 years!', "When individuals, teams, and entire enterprises connect with the world's leading experts and content providers, anything is possible. Whether you're working to advance your career, be a better manager, or achieve the next breakthrough in technology or business, learning new skills is at the heart of it all.", 'Preferred skills', 'Strong data structure and algorithm knowledge', 'About the Company', 'We share the knowledge and teach the skills people need to change their world. For more than 40 years, O’Reilly has imparted the world-shaping ideas of innovators through books, articles, conferences, and our online learning platform.', 'Bonus skills', 'Requirements', "O'Reilly Media is looking for a machine learning engineer to inform the direction and execution of our internal personalization and user tracking system built to support our learning platform.", 'Learning should not be measured in terms of usage, course completion, or certifications. Learning should be measured in terms of outcomes. We want to prepare people to solve challenging problems and inspire them with what’s possible for the future.\xa0\xa0', "A bachelor's degree in a math focused discipline, or equivalent real world experienceExperience working with a modern data science / statistics platform such as scikit, R, SAS, matlab or similar.Experience with how to design features for use in a linear model and/or a neural network to achieve specific predictive outcomes.Previous experience working with an object oriented programming language such as Java or Scala.The extreme desire to learn and solve problems you have never encountered before.", 'We are interested in people who have experience building and supporting web applications with a diverse and engaged user base. We desire candidates who work comfortably in an agile environment and with collaborators who are distributed across multiple time zones. We value colleagues who are helpful, respectful, humble, and always willing to do what’s best for our users. We desire developers who treat automated tests as essential, and believe that code reviews are a crucial path of learning and of sharing knowledge. The women and men of our platform team have taken many traditional and nontraditional paths to the developer profession, and we welcome diverse teams that are bound together by a mutual love of learning.', 'Docker + Kubernetes', 'The extreme desire to learn and solve problems you have never encountered before.', 'About You', 'Previous experience working with an object oriented programming language such as Java or Scala.']

(Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)', 'Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.', 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi HealthDevelop and implement data models to guide business decisionsMapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.Defining technical standards and guidelines. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).Leveraging existing [core] data assets.Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', 'Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.', 'A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.', 'Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.', 'Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0', 'WHICH LEADER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT?', "Nomi Health is led by Mark Newman (Founder/CEO) , Josh Walker (Co-Founder, COO) and Boe Hartman (Co-Founder, CTO). Both Mark, Josh and Boe have a proven track record in the HR Tech, Health Tech, Health plans, Pharmacy and Financial Service industries. Mark, previously Founder/CEO of HireVue where he scaled the company from 0 to $40m ARR with a successful exit of over $500M. Josh, comes with 18+ years of experience in healthcare as COO at Imagine Health, Upwell and OptumInsight where he has first-hand experience in international and domestic healthcare markets leading and expanding business growth. Boe has served in multiple senior positions across global banking for over 25 years.\xa0Most recently, at Goldman Sachs as a Partner, where he led the firm’s launch of it’s digital consumer bank; Marcus By Goldman Sachs and the firm's entry into the consumer credit card market.", 'Data Science Engineer requirements are:', 'Chief Technology Officer', 'Health, Dental, Vision, 401k with match, Commuter benefits with Great Pay, plus Equity.', 'Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).', 'Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.', 'Benefits', 'Mapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Documentation of a data source must describe the semantics of the data so that the occasional subtle differences in meaning are understood.', 'Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.', 'Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)', '\ufeffNomi Health is offering a highly competitive compensation package with an attractive base salary as well as a significant equity stake into the company at an early stage.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.Must have AWS or Azure experience. (Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.Outstanding problem solver.Good written and verbal communication skills.", 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi Health', 'Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.', 'Requirements', 'Nomi Health is the modern payment system for employee healthcare. We sidestep the middlemen, and connect employers providers and families directly at scale to cut healthcare costs by 30% across America. We will do this by eliminating high cost “out of network” charges, making the process all digital with easy access to real data and understandable actions.\xa0', 'Develop and implement data models to guide business decisions', 'We are looking for a Data Science Engineer who can help pave the way for more work in the data field and start by analyzing our current needs and use data to generate value with Nomi Health’s end goal in mind. From this goal, you will design the architecture and the analytics pipelines while taking into account appropriate time frames, and costs.', 'Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', 'As a Data Science Engineer you will provide technical and domain subject knowledge to the company and future customers. You should be able to know how to examine new data systems requirements and implement migration models. You will also spend a good deal of time problem solving, analyzing architecture and assessing architect models, reviewing data migrations, selecting platforms and on-boarding of data management solutions that meet the technical and operational needs of the business.\xa0You must be hands-on with tools and code.', 'Since we are early in our journey and we will be soon dealing with a lot of data, this person will set the stage for future work of data scientists and data engineers.\xa0', 'WHO ARE WE?\xa0', 'Leveraging existing [core] data assets.', 'WHAT IS A DAY IN THE LIFE?', 'Outstanding problem solver.', 'WHY IS THIS ROLE CRITICAL?', 'Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.', 'Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.", 'Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.', 'Good written and verbal communication skills.', 'The company is in stealth mode right now and has raised over $10M in seed funding which will be used to hire and develop the product, technology and go-to-market team.\xa0']

['', 'Ability to work closely with teammates in a highly collaborative environment, as well as providing strong individual contributions', 'Collaborating on writing research articles for external publication where appropriate', 'Your qualifications are:', 'Analyzing and drawing insights from large scale conversational datasetsChoosing between many available state-of-the-art methods and tools, and consistently finding the most effective, efficient, stable, explainable, and where possible, simple approachesDesigning and building modern, flexible pipelines and services for delivering and navigating insightsBringing research-driven models to life within production systemsCreating durable, flexible scientific deployment and experimentation capabilitiesWork on challenging unsupervised and semi-supervised problems related to intent and dialog management, and create pipelines to accelerate and scale this effortUsing and presenting research findings in ways that inform and sometimes guide business and product strategyCollaborating on writing research articles for external publication where appropriate', 'Ability to efficiently write, test, monitor, and improve production-quality code', 'Curiosity and interest in learning new applications and tooling', 'LivePerson is a transformational force in how brands and consumers communicate. With over 18,000 brands, including Citi, HSBC, Disney, Verizon, and Home Depot, we are on a mission to make life easier for people and brands everywhere through trusted Conversational AI. We believe in a future where conversations are the norm for getting your intentions fulfilled - whatever they are.', '\xa0', 'LivePerson was named to FastCompany’s World’s most innovative companies of 2020 list for the Artificial Intelligence category. We offer top tier tech & data science colleagues, along with opportunities to push your own limits. We embrace invention and experimentation. ['', 'Requisition ID:', 'Build and understand surgical datasets', 'Build training pipelines', 'Good understanding of ML application design principles is required.', 'Build training pipelines Typically it is possible to leverage well known ML models to solve many problems we face in robotic surgery. However, the unique data sources provided by the robot will require some model customization to maximize accuracy and solve many of the more difficult problems. ', 'In depth knowledge of a modern deep learning framework such as Tensorflow, Pytorch or Caffe is required.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering, with minimum of four (4) years of industry experience working regularly with deep learning. Master’s degree with a focus in ML with minimum of two (2) years of industry experienced in deep learning or a PhD with a focus in ML is preferred.', 'Understand clinical problems that ML can solve This will involve gaining understanding of current robotic surgical workflows and typical challenges faced by surgeons. Build and understand surgical datasets A challenging aspect of working on ML for surgery is that datasets are hard to find, typically messy and have poorly understood labelling requirements. Collecting and structuring datasets as well as writing annotation instructions will be a regular occurrence. Understanding the data deeply so that sensible annotation parameters can be defined is a key requirement of the role.Build training pipelines Typically it is possible to leverage well known ML models to solve many problems we face in robotic surgery. However, the unique data sources provided by the robot will require some model customization to maximize accuracy and solve many of the more difficult problems. Deploy inference pipelines This role is product focused so deployment is a huge part of delivering value in this role. Real-time processing is a must so skills in distilling models for fast inference is vital. job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', '===', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Responsibilities', 'Required Qualifications', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', '.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. ['', '-Five + years of optimization-oriented, analytical problem solving in an industrial setting with open source tools such as Python and R.', '-At least five years of demonstrated success in database design, data mining, and reporting.', 'Qualified candidates must have:', '-Demonstrated ability to provide thought leadership and\xa0supervise (or mentor) junior data scientists.', 'Leading food service distributor seeks an optimization expert to provide thought and people leadership throughout the organization. You will provide data driven insights to address key business questions within Supply Chain and beyond. By designing and creating data sets, developing analytical tools and reports, you will support the business, product owner and other members of the Insights and Analytics team. Ultimately, you will collaborate throughout the organization to create sustainable approaches, tools, processes, and programs to solve problems for business partners.', '-MS/PhD in an analytical field with AT LEAST five years of progressive data analytics/science industry experience in food distribution, retail, CPG or a related industry.', '\ufeff', '-Pronounced consulting and influencing skills.']

You will participate in the engineering life-cycle at Twitter, including designing distributed systems, writing production code and data pipelines, conducting code reviews and working alongside our infrastructure and reliability teams. You’ll apply data science, machine learning, and/or graph analysis techniques to a variety of modeling and relevance problems involving users, their social graph, their tweets, and their behavior.Are you an engineer who’s interested in tackling very challenging adversarial problems and passionate about defending online users against abuse, spam, and manipulation? Do you love working on challenging problems that require a multi-disciplinary approach, creative solutions, and rapid product iterations? Will you be proud to work on a real-time, scalable system that serves millions of users daily? job_title: Data Scientist/Sr. Data Scientist, Analytics and Informatics
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Provide support on a wide range of scientific computing needs across teams, including evaluation of experimental designs, data acquisition and storage requirements, and selection of appropriate methods of analysis.', ' PhD in genetics, genomics, biomedical engineering, computer science and technology or related life science discipline 3+ years of experience in the biotechnology and/or pharmaceutical industry preferred. Postdoctoral candidates with excellent publication records will also be considered. Highly proficient in using Python or R to work with large structured and unstructured datasets. Expertise in Biological Data Science tools and approaches. Expertise in NGS analysis (g. BAMtools, genome annotation, splicing prediction, multiple sequence alignments, conservation prediction, mutational analyses etc.) and development of novel NGS analysis pipelines Familiarity with RNA biology including splicing, RNA editing, transcription and translation Experience with Machine Learning a plus. Experience with Cloud Computing (AWS) a plus. Experience with RNA or protein structure-based engineering a plus Expertise in Clinical Statistics, drug discovery or drug development a plus Innovative mindset and ability to research and implement bioinformatic, statistical, and machine learning algorithms or transfer existing techniques to our application domain. Proven success and strong track record in computational biology and genomics, as demonstrated through high quality peer-reviewed publications and/or asset creation. ', 'Innovative mindset and ability to research and implement bioinformatic, statistical, and machine learning algorithms or transfer existing techniques to our application domain.', "Develop, implement, and validate computational, statistical and/or machine learning methods to interrogate large scale biological datasets in the advancement of ShapeTx's RNA editing-based therapeutic technologies.", 'Expertise in Biological Data Science tools and approaches.', 'PhD in genetics, genomics, biomedical engineering, computer science and technology or related life science discipline', "Work side by side with ShapeTx's bench scientists and leadership to develop strategies for answering key RNA editing-based scientific questions.", 'Experience with RNA or protein structure-based engineering a plus', 'Expertise in Clinical Statistics, drug discovery or drug development a plus', 'Practice modern software development in a team environment following industry standards, produce high quality code and documentations. Support novel target identification and indication assessments in a range of metabolic, rare diseases, and neurologic therapeutic areas.', 'Experience with Machine Learning a plus.', '3+ years of experience in the biotechnology and/or pharmaceutical industry preferred. Postdoctoral candidates with excellent publication records will also be considered.', 'Experience with Cloud Computing (AWS) a plus.', 'Requirements:', 'Data Scientist / Senior Data Scientist', 'Excellent communication and decision-making skills', 'Highly proficient in using Python or R to work with large structured and unstructured datasets.', 'Expertise in NGS analysis (g. BAMtools, genome annotation, splicing prediction, multiple sequence alignments, conservation prediction, mutational analyses etc.) and development of novel NGS analysis pipelines', ' Ability to operate and thrive in a fast-paced, start-up environment Entrepreneurial mindset and ability to function in a complex and ambiguous environment Excellent communication and decision-making skills Ability to dive into technical details and discussions on active research programs', 'Ability to operate and thrive in a fast-paced, start-up environment', 'Entrepreneurial mindset and ability to function in a complex and ambiguous environment', 'Ability to dive into technical details and discussions on active research programs', 'Proven success and strong track record in computational biology and genomics, as demonstrated through high quality peer-reviewed publications and/or asset creation.', 'Represent ShapeTx to the external scientific community via presentations, publications, etc.', 'Familiarity with RNA biology including splicing, RNA editing, transcription and translation', 'Roles And Responsibilities', " Develop, implement, and validate computational, statistical and/or machine learning methods to interrogate large scale biological datasets in the advancement of ShapeTx's RNA editing-based therapeutic technologies. Work side by side with ShapeTx's bench scientists and leadership to develop strategies for answering key RNA editing-based scientific questions. Provide support on a wide range of scientific computing needs across teams, including evaluation of experimental designs, data acquisition and storage requirements, and selection of appropriate methods of analysis. Practice modern software development in a team environment following industry standards, produce high quality code and documentations. Support novel target identification and indication assessments in a range of metabolic, rare diseases, and neurologic therapeutic areas. Represent ShapeTx to the external scientific community via presentations, publications, etc. ", 'Skills and Experience:']

job_title: Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up
job_text: ['', 'Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.', 'Professional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)', 'You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.", "Orama are proud to announce their exclusive partnership with an AI Marketing Software Start-up who are tipped to be one of the biggest success stories of 2021. Their unique value proposition allows enterprise companies to understand and predict their customers' buying habits/patterns combining data gained from omnichannel marketing tech with the latest machine learning advances. Following their recent addtion of $40m+ round of funding, they are looking to hire a Data Science specialist who can help create value within their largest customers by deriving insights from data. This is a unique opportunity to play a pivotal role in their growth - GET IN TOUCH NOW!", 'A self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value Creation', 'Experience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)', 'Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0', 'Desired Skills and Experience', 'Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniquesProfessional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and mungingProfessional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQueryExperience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modelingA self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value CreationExperience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.", 'Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling', 'Basic $100K-150K + bonus + Stock + Benefits', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniques', 'Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQuery', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', '.', 'Professional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and munging', 'Experience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential']

You will not get a response.', 'What will you do?', 'Vendor interaction: working with external resources to solve problems, acquire data, and improve relationships.', 'System tools: experience with scripting languages (Perl, Python, shell scripts, etc.), and Unix-based operating systems (especially Linux)', 'Role Overview', 'Applications: experience designing, developing, and maintaining software applications', 'Programming: strong experience with Python, Java, SQL, and/or similar languages', 'What are you like?', 'Large data sets: experience developing programs to parse, process, clean, organize, and analyze large data sets', 'For over two decades, our team has built quantitative trading systems that have produced exceptional results across a range of financial markets. We use scientific methods and engineering discipline to solve challenging problems and develop technology solutions. Our Irvine office is as unique as our Southern California location, combining elements of high tech, finance, and applied research in a collegial atmosphere and beautiful workspace.', 'The hiring process for this role is managed by Scouted, a job-matching platform focused on early-career talent. In order to be considered, click the ‘Apply’ button. If you have an\xa0urgent\xa0question, email scouted@scouted.io.', 'Successful candidates will have experience in a number of the following general areas:\xa0', 'Data is a core part of our business and our data-focused software developers are among our most valued resources. This role is mission-critical, so we’re searching for an uncommonly reliable professional who enjoys coding, working with and analyzing data, and providing support for production systems. In addition to programming and data analysis, this position is likely to involve interaction with external resources such as data providers, brokers, dealers, and software vendors.', 'Programming: strong experience with Python, Java, SQL, and/or similar languagesLarge data sets: experience developing programs to parse, process, clean, organize, and analyze large data setsApplications: experience designing, developing, and maintaining software applicationsVendor interaction: working with external resources to solve problems, acquire data, and improve relationships.System tools: experience with scripting languages (Perl, Python, shell scripts, etc.), and Unix-based operating systems (especially Linux)']
