job_title: Principal IT Data Engineer, Advanced Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Advanced Analytics Team', 'At Raytheon, we work together as one global team creating trusted, innovative solutions to make the world a safer place. Our innovation spans all domains: from land and sea to air, space and cyberspace. We’re inspired by a noble mission that’s shared by Raytheon employees around the globe and an inclusive culture that empowers employees and celebrates their contributions.', 'Date posted\xa010/05/2020', 'Ability to obtain a US Government Clearance when necessary to support specific programs in the future. Except in rare cases, only US Citizens are eligible to obtain US Security Clearances', 'Process complex, large-scale data sets used for modeling, data mining, and research', 'Job ID\xa0169636BR', 'State\xa0MA', 'Experience as a Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineer, Software Developer, DevOps Engineer or Data Engineer', 'Businesses', 'Relocation eligible', 'Stand-up, maintain, and update data processing infrastructures in partnership with data architects and infrastructure engineers', '8+ years total professional experience with Bachelor’s Degree. Over 10 years of directly applicable experience will be considered in lieu of degree.', 'City', 'Demonstrable experience working with stakeholders and analysts to gather requirements for deployment of artificial intelligence applications at scale.', 'Identify and create new derivatives and/or aggregations of data to be used across multiple functions, products, and markets', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred.', 'Clearance type\xa0None / Not Required', 'The selected applicant is required to obtain a US Government Clearance when necessary to support specific programs in the future. Except in rare cases, only US Citizens are eligible to obtain US Security Clearances.', 'Relocation support is available at a capped budget to be discussed with the applicant of choice at the proper time, if the person is eligible per company policy.', 'Principal Data Engineer', 'Background in all aspects of software engineering with strong skills in parallel data processing, data flows, REST APIs, JSON, XML and microservice architecture', 'Raytheon Missiles & Defense Digital Technology (RMD DT)', 'Clearance type', 'Design and development experience on Hadoop ecosystem (Hadoop, Hbase, PIG, Hive, and MapReduce) including two or more of the following related technologies – Scala, SPARK, Sqoop, Flume, Kafka, and Python', 'Relocation eligible\xa0Yes', 'Required Education (including Major):', 'Work with product teams and data scientists to improve the efficiency and speed of computational modelsStand-up, maintain, and update data processing infrastructures in partnership with data architects and infrastructure engineersIdentify and create new derivatives and/or aggregations of data to be used across multiple functions, products, and marketsProcess complex, large-scale data sets used for modeling, data mining, and researchValidate advanced models in support of advanced analytical applications through data quality profiling and leveraging tools for programmatically monitoring and refining production machine learning applicationsProvide consulting and investigative expertise to partners and customers on data problems or questions about the scope and potential uses of data to achieve business valueLeverage diversity of technical skills to lead design and sustainment of data pipelines and data warehousing for data ingested/integrated from legacy enterprise systems, streaming sources, web scraped sources, purchased data feeds, APIs, etc.', 'If you’re a team player passionate about data and emerging technologies—and you possess a relentless drive to improve how business is done—take a look at this Data Engineer opportunity on our Advanced Analytics team.', 'Businesses\xa0Raytheon Missiles & Defense', 'Raytheon Technologies is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.', 'Are you passionate about data', 'Expert designing data warehousing and best practices around implementing processes for loading data', 'envision, build and help sustain analytics data environments and pipelines for the Raytheon internal business users', 'City\xa0Andover', '5+ years of development experience with Python', '5+ years of advanced experience with SQL scripting and database management systems such as Microsoft SQL DB or Oracle DB', 'Country', 'Responsibilities of Role:', 'Experience as a Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineer, Software Developer, DevOps Engineer or Data Engineer5+ years of development experience with PythonDemonstrable experience working with complex distributed systems5+ years of advanced experience with SQL scripting and database management systems such as Microsoft SQL DB or Oracle DBExpert designing data warehousing and best practices around implementing processes for loading dataExtensive Linux server management background', 'Validate advanced models in support of advanced analytical applications through data quality profiling and leveraging tools for programmatically monitoring and refining production machine learning applications', 'Leverage diversity of technical skills to lead design and sustainment of data pipelines and data warehousing for data ingested/integrated from legacy enterprise systems, streaming sources, web scraped sources, purchased data feeds, APIs, etc.', 'Country\xa0United States', 'Demonstrable experience working with stakeholders and analysts to gather requirements for deployment of artificial intelligence applications at scale.Ability to obtain a US Government Clearance when necessary to support specific programs in the future. Except in rare cases, only US Citizens are eligible to obtain US Security ClearancesStrong understanding and hands-on programming/scripting experience skills—UNIX shell, Perl, and JavaScriptDesign and development experience on Hadoop ecosystem (Hadoop, Hbase, PIG, Hive, and MapReduce) including two or more of the following related technologies – Scala, SPARK, Sqoop, Flume, Kafka, and PythonWorking knowledge of container technologies like Docker and KubernetesBackground in all aspects of software engineering with strong skills in parallel data processing, data flows, REST APIs, JSON, XML and microservice architectureAdvanced Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred', '169636', 'Working knowledge of container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred.8+ years total professional experience with Bachelor’s Degree. Over 10 years of directly applicable experience will be considered in lieu of degree.', 'Date posted', 'Advanced Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred', 'Desired Skills:', 'Job ID', 'Are you passionate about data, software engineering, and enabling the promise of Artificial Intelligence through the optimized deployment of Machine Learning systems at scale? Our team at Raytheon seeks a production focused data engineer who enjoys contributing to the realization of business value rather than pure research. The candidate will execute their mission through working across functional and business areas to research, develop, architect and execute leading-edge IT solutions focused on data integration, information management and advanced analytics. The candidate will be relied upon to\xa0envision, build and help sustain analytics data environments and pipelines for the Raytheon internal business users. Solutions and applications will span our manufacturing, engineering, supply chain, and quality control functions. There will also be opportunities to contribute to developing external customer research and solutions.', 'Work with product teams and data scientists to improve the efficiency and speed of computational models', 'Extensive Linux server management background', 'Provide consulting and investigative expertise to partners and customers on data problems or questions about the scope and potential uses of data to achieve business value', 'Strong understanding and hands-on programming/scripting experience skills—UNIX shell, Perl, and JavaScript', 'Demonstrable experience working with complex distributed systems', 'Required Skills:', 'State']

['', 'Analyze metagenomic datasets generated from sequencing of bacterial communities, using proprietary state-of-the-art pipelines ', 'We are seeking an experienced and motivated bioinformatics researcher\xa0to support our internal bioinformatics platform. teams to facilitate quality of study execution and problem resolution (Director)', ' • Provide relevant clinical scientist expertise to internal teams, including clinical operations, medical writing, ['', "Bachelor's degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Visual Communications, Psychology, Sociology, or a related field or equivalent practical experience.", 'Develop research plans that span the full product development cycle and integrate User Experience Research into the development process.', 'Work closely with cross-functional partners (product, design, data, business and development) to identify and prioritize knowledge gaps in our understanding of the user experience, and conduct research that contributes to solving those knowledge gaps.', 'Excellent presentation skills', 'Effective interpersonal, communication, negotiation and collaboration skills.', 'Broad experience of both qualitative and quantitative research methods, strong understanding of the strengths and shortcomings of different research methods, including when and how to apply them during each product phase.', 'Provide the user perspective and communicate the most relevant industry and competitive insights to stakeholders in all departments.', '5+ years of relevant work experience in a role of a User Researcher', 'Perks', 'COMMUNITY DETAILS AND PERKS', 'What you’ll be doing:', 'Description', 'Collect and analyze user behavior through different research methodologies such as data analysis, online experiments, lab studies, interviews and surveys.', 'We offer a comprehensive insurance package at no out of pocket cost to the employee, 401k, Pre-tax commuter benefits, and a generous vacation policy.We are a dog friendly in-person and virtual office!For new employees joining us during this remote work period, we offer a comprehensive virtual onboarding experience with a stipend to get your remote office set up. We have frequent Bizzabonding activities including bi-weekly sponsored lunches, bi-weekly happy hours, virtual cooking classes, yoga classes, fitness classes, and other virtual bonding activities to keep our Bizzaboers engaged and connected. We welcome all new ideas and encourage each Bizzaboer to participate or lead their own virtual event!Our office is located on 27th and Broadway south of Madison Square Garden. ['Basic Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.', 'Exploratory data analyses and investigations.', 'Experience communicating projects to both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'You have deep experience with these things: logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'You know when to use machine learning and when not to!', 'Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.', 'Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.', 'Writing production-quality code.', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.', 'Strong theoretical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, optimization.', 'You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.', 'Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.', 'Experience writing complex SQL queries.', '4+ years of hands-on experience in working with NumPy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solving them.', 'You will have an opportunity to work on a small and growing team based in San Francisco in an environment where engineering is central to what we do. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software, and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable, and inclusive. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with great people.', 'Today, nearly every business in the world\xa0has to\xa0do bookkeeping and accounting in order to file taxes, understand financial health, and most importantly, make strategic business decisions. It’s a product-focused machine learning team’s dream. Sage Intacct Artificial Intelligence Labs “SAIL” is a nimble team within Sage Intacct building the future of cloud accounting by leveraging artificial intelligence. The SAIL team builds capabilities to help businesses make better decisions through data-powered insights. We are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Scientist in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products\xa0and services. As a part of our cross-functional team, including data scientists and engineers, you will help steer the direction of the entire company’s Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning effort and you D. in Neuroscience, Molecular Biology, Pharmacology, Physiology, or related field', '\xa0', 'Specialized training in genetic engineering, molecular biology, and cutting edge neuroscience technologies', 'Familiarity with animal surgery, mouse genetics, neuroanatomy, confocal microscopy, and rodent behavioral analysis', 'US citizens or permanent residents', 'Recent Ph. D. in Neuroscience, Molecular Biology, Pharmacology, Physiology, or related fieldA track record of productivity and prior publications.Strong background in Molecular BiologyFamiliarity with animal surgery, mouse genetics, neuroanatomy, confocal microscopy, and rodent behavioral analysisCreative thinking skills and excellence in problem-solvingExcellent oral and written communication skillsInnate source of curiosity and enthusiasm to learn new methods and test new hypothesesUS citizens or permanent residents', 'Salary starts at $50,000, commensurate with experience. \xa0Interested candidates should submit the following: a letter describing their relevant experience, curriculum vitae, and contact information for 2-3 references to Dr. Xiao-Hong Lu at xlu1@lsuhsc.edu. Shreveport–Bossier City metropolitan area is a wonderful place for learning, working, and living! (https://www.lsuhs.edu/about/shreveport-bossie) \xa0LSU Health-Shreveport is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'A track record of productivity and prior publications.', 'Work with NASA to learn how to sustain human life in the extreme environment of space in preparation for human missions to Mars', 'The Lu lab (www.luneurolab.org) at Louisiana State University Health-Shreveport is seeking a talented and motivated postdoctoral fellow to spearhead an exciting NASA-funded research project aiming at the development of a novel genetic single-cell biodosimetry to predict clinical health outcomes in human spaceflight crews. Funded by NIH and NASA, research in Lu lab focuses on the molecular genetics of basal ganglia related neuropsychiatric disorders and the development of innovative neuroscience technologies. \xa0Lu lab employs genetic engineering, CRISPR/Cas mediated genome editing, BAC transgenesis, newly invented Mosaicism with Repeat Frameshift (MORF), wireless optogenetics, chemogenetic, multi-photon/super-resolution microscope imaging, mini-scope for in vivo imaging neuronal activity, deep learning augmented volume imaging, single-cell sequencing, and WGCNA network analysis. We seek candidates with the following qualifications:', 'Opportunities:', 'Work with NASA to learn how to sustain human life in the extreme environment of space in preparation for human missions to MarsSpecialized training in genetic engineering, molecular biology, and cutting edge neuroscience technologiesAccess to state-of-the-art super-resolution imaging, multi-photon microscopy, spinning disc confocal, deep learning augmented volume imaging, next gen-sequencing, and mass spectrometry.', 'Creative thinking skills and excellence in problem-solving']

This experience need not have been in the federal government.Experience refers to paid and unpaid experience, including volunteer work done through National Service programs (e.g., Peace Corps, AmeriCorps) and other organizations (e.g., professional; philanthropic; religious; spiritual; community, student, social). Specialized experience MUST include all of the following:Participating in providing systems engineering guidance and/or support in developing plans for the management of scientific data;Planning end-to-end development of new enterprise data products based on current and projected future needs; andPartnering with IT, engineers and data users to translate requirements into development of an enterprise system strategy facilitated throughout the product development lifecycle (i.e., requirements through implementation) and product quality evaluation.EducationCollege Transcript: If you are qualifying based on education, submit a copy of your college transcript that lists college courses detailing each course by the number and department (i.e., bio 101, math 210, etc.), course title, number of credit hours and grade earned. You must submit evidence that any education completed in a foreign institution is equivalent to U.S. education standards with your resume. You may submit an unofficial copy of the transcript at the initial phase of the application process. If course content cannot be easily identified from the title of the course as listed on your transcript, you must submit an official course description from the college/university that reflects the content at the time the course was taken.Note: Your college transcript is used to verify successful completion of degree, or college course work. An official college transcript will be required before you can report to duty.Additional informationCTAP and ICTAP candidates will be eligible if it is determined that they have met the minimum qualifications for the position. Information about CTAP and ICTAP eligibility is on the Office of Personnel Management’s Career Transition Resources website at: Employee Guide to Career TransitionCTAP Applicants MUST Submit The Following DocumentsA copy of your specific RIF notice; notice of proposed removal for failure to relocate; a Certificate of Expected Separation (CES); or certification that you are in a surplus organization or occupation (this could be a position abolishment letter, a notice eligibility for discontinued service retirement, or similar notice).A copy of your SF-50 “Notification of Personnel Action”, noting current position, grade level, and duty location;A copy of your latest performance appraisal including your rating; andAny documentation from your agency that shows your current promotion potential.ICTAP Applicants MUST Submit The Following DocumentsA copy of your RIF separation notice; notice of proposed removal for failure to relocate; notice of disability annuity termination; certification from your former agency that it cannot place you after your recovery from a compensable injury; or certification from the National Guard Bureau or Military Department that you are eligible for disability retirement;A copy of your SF-50 “Notification of Personnel Action” documenting your RIF separation, noting your positions, grade level, and duty location, and/or Agency certification of inability to place you through RPL, etc;A copy of your latest performance appraisal including your rating; andAny documentation from your agency that shows your current promotion potential.NOAA participates in e-Verify. E-Verify is an Internet based system operated by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) in partnership with the Social Security Administration (SSA) that enables participating employers to electronically verify the employment eligibility of their newly hired employees.How You Will Be EvaluatedYou will be evaluated for this job based on how well you meet the qualifications above.We will review your resume, optional cover letter and supporting documentation to determine if you meet the minimum qualifications for the position.Veteran’s Preference does not apply to direct hire recruitment procedures.Any selections made under this notice will be processed as new appointments to the civil service. Therefore, Current Federal employees would be given new appointments to the civil service and may have to serve a new probationary period under CFR 315.802 (b).NOTE: A one year probationary period will be required under the Direct Hire Authority unless you are a current Department of Commerce employee and are in the same line of work and with no more than a 30 day break in service.To preview questions please click here .Background checks and security clearanceSecurity clearanceOtherDrug test requiredNoThis job is open toCareer transition (CTAP, ICTAP, RPL)Federal employees who meet the definition of a "surplus" or "displaced" employee. Candidate will be highly involved with product development.', ' We are looking for a data scientist to grow our existing automation efforts by enhancing our data analysis and data architecture practices.', ' Medical Dental 401k Paid time off Work/life balance Career development Mentorship opportunities Rewards & recognition', ' You will establish working data sets, configurations, and profiles in support of metric analysis.', ' The Double Eagle II contract recently increased its scope to begin defining and utilizing Data Science and Data Visualization practices to optimize and reinvigorate how multiple data sets are analyzed. We are looking for a data scientist to grow our existing automation efforts by enhancing our data analysis and data architecture practices. You will support a satellite operations contract where the field of data science is being developed from the ground up. You will become one of the first Data Scientists on the contract in order to define new data CONOPS, develop/automate optimized data flows, and utilize Data Science practices in order to revolutionize how the contract operates. You can expect to be involved in Enterprise outreach and defining requirements to use and analyze data for multiple mission partners and contract leadership. Candidate will be highly involved with product development. You will establish working data sets, configurations, and profiles in support of metric analysis. You will apply complex analysis of data in support of mission problems, with expertise in problem solving, scripting in multiple languages, as well as the creation and/or implementation of tools and processes that aid in advanced analytics, testing and quality assurance, and DevOps. Leverage automation and machine learning to manage data, predict scenarios and make recommendations. Contribute to building new analytical tools and packages across the enterprise and will be expected to collaborate with team members in a highly technical environment. You may perform outreach to potential new customers to educate them on our available products and how we can leverage our offerings to increase efficiency within their teams.', ' Career development', ' Medical', 'Here Are Some Of The Benefits You Can Enjoy', ' Dental', ' The Double Eagle II contract recently increased its scope to begin defining and utilizing Data Science and Data Visualization practices to optimize and reinvigorate how multiple data sets are analyzed.', ' 401k', ' Rewards & recognition']

['', 'FLSA Status', 'Proven ability to communicate research findings and insights to cross-functional teams and executive leadership in a way that promotes impact on product design.', ' Proven ability to self-direct and lead multiple research projects. Extensive experience selecting and executing qualitative methods such as interviews, contextual inquiry, focus groups, diary studies, and concept/usability evaluation. Proven ability to communicate research findings and insights to cross-functional teams and executive leadership in a way that promotes impact on product design. Demonstrated ability to identify product opportunities by connecting user problems, analytics, and business goals. Experience partnering with product management to define and drive roadmaps to include user-centric features. Minimum 5 years of experience integrating user research into product design practices, preferably in the medical device or health and wellness domain. Bachelor’s/Master’s in Human Factors, Psychology, Anthropology, Cognitive Science, Biomedical Engineering, or related field. Willing to travel up to 20% of the time to conduct user research. ', 'Experience partnering with product management to define and drive roadmaps to include user-centric features.', 'Willing to travel up to 20% of the time to conduct user research.', 'Contribute to the development of product strategy and roadmap through user advocacy and dissemination of insights.', 'Bachelor’s/Master’s in Human Factors, Psychology, Anthropology, Cognitive Science, Biomedical Engineering, or related field.', ' Resume A portfolio or writing example that exhibits your creative and thoughtful approach to solving a usability challenge and your overall research process ', 'Extensive experience selecting and executing qualitative methods such as interviews, contextual inquiry, focus groups, diary studies, and concept/usability evaluation.', 'Demonstrated ability to identify product opportunities by connecting user problems, analytics, and business goals.', 'Minimum 5 years of experience integrating user research into product design practices, preferably in the medical device or health and wellness domain.', 'Application Requirements', "Design and lead mixed-method studies to help project teams learn about our users' attitudes and behaviors.", "IRhythm's User Experience (UX) Team", 'Partner with cross-functional teams to turn business and product curiosities into actionable research plans.', 'Collaborate with Product Management and Product Design to generate concepts that solve problems for our users.', 'About This Role', " Partner with cross-functional teams to turn business and product curiosities into actionable research plans. Design and lead mixed-method studies to help project teams learn about our users' attitudes and behaviors. Collaborate with Product Management and Product Design to generate concepts that solve problems for our users. Lead and mentor UX Researchers within projects and through the development of their craft. Recruit, screen, and coordinate participants to ensure we have the right participants in our studies. Iteratively test concepts with appropriate user groups; analyze data to identify the best direction for achieving project goals and user needs. Confidently present your findings and recommendations in compelling ways to obtain buy-in from cross-functional stakeholders. Contribute to the development of product strategy and roadmap through user advocacy and dissemination of insights. Build a panel of research participants and devise creative methods to keep them actively engaged. Combine quantitative and qualitative data to evaluate the success of features during pilots and post-launch. ", 'Recruit, screen, and coordinate participants to ensure we have the right participants in our studies.', 'Iteratively test concepts with appropriate user groups; analyze data to identify the best direction for achieving project goals and user needs.', 'Lead and mentor UX Researchers within projects and through the development of their craft.', 'What’s In It For You', 'As a part of our core values, we ensure a diverse and inclusive workforce. We welcome and celebrate people of all backgrounds, experiences, skills and perspectives. iRhythm Technologies, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer (M/F/V/D). ['Company Overview:', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Related Work Experience', 'WORKING CONDITIONS', 'The health and safety of our employees and candidates is very important to us. Spectrum has adopted virtual mobile recruiting tools that allow us to continue meeting new candidates. We look forward to “virtually” meeting you.The Spectrum brands (including Spectrum Networks, Spectrum Enterprise and Spectrum Reach) are powered and innovated by Charter Communications. Charter Communications reaffirms its commitment to providing equal opportunities for employment and advancement to qualified employees and applicants. Individuals will be considered for positions for which they meet the minimum qualifications and are able to perform without regard to race, color, gender, age, religion, disability, national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'Education', "Company Overview:Charter Communications is America’s fastest growing TV, internet and voice company. We’re committed to integrating the highest quality service with superior entertainment and communications products. Charter is at the intersection of technology and entertainment, facilitating essential communications that connect 24 million residential and business customers in 41 states. Our commitment to serving customers and exceeding their expectations is the bedrock of Charter’s business strategy and it’s the philosophy that guides our 90,000 employees.JOB SUMMARYThe Advanced Analytics group has implemented and is operating a new advanced Big Data analytics platform that enables new self-service analytics, decision engineering support, machine learning, modeling, forecasting, and optimizations in Charter’s Advanced Engineering organization. This position is responsible to create and maintain scalable, reliable, consistent and repeatable platforms, systems, and models that support data, data products, and analytical products for advanced analytics by gathering, processing, exploring, and modeling raw and diverse data at scale. It requires lifecycle management of multiple data sources, data discovery, and models. This position architects and delivers models, analytics, automation, and self-service, which are major tenets of the analytics platform.The most successful candidate will have lifecycle experience in machine learning, deep learning, and/or artificial intelligence within modern parallel environments, such as GPU-enabled platforms and distributed clusters. This lifecycle includes conceiving, developing, prototyping, analyzing, and implementing models with very large (i.e., the top end of big data) and diverse datasets and in collaboration with stakeholders. Desirable experience includes using big data platforms for sources (e.g., Snowflake, AWS/s3, and Hadoop) to create deep learning and machine learning models with GPU-based Python (e.g., NVIDIA/DGX/RAPIDS).MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESFrames and models meaningful business and engineering scenarios that impact critical business and engineering processes, architectures, and/or decisionsResearches, develops, and implements machine learning models, deep learning models, artificial intelligence, and algorithms that solve business and engineering problemsDevelops innovative and effective approaches to solve model problems while communicating the results and methodologiesLeverages multiple data sources to produce products that solve the needs of business and engineering for descriptive models, predictive models, diagnostic models, and prescriptive modelsApplies data mining, data discovery, machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence techniques to large structured and unstructured datasets for model creationGathers and processes raw data at scale from any source and in any formatBalances workloads and operational demands with open source technologies, cloud services, and commercial solutions while optimizing cost and time-to-solution demandsCreates highly reusable code modules, templates, and packages that can be leveraged across model lifecycleIncreases speed to delivery by architecting and implementing automated solutionsMentors, educates, and provides senior leadership to data scientists, data analysts, and data engineersREQUIRED QUALIFICATIONSAbility to create proof of concept experiments for analytics, machine learning, or visualization tools that includes hypothesis, test plans, and outcome analysis.Ability to create unsupervised and supervised models. Time series expertise is a plus.Solid statistical knowledge and techniques.Exceptional programming skills in PythonExperience with one of the deep learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.Develop highly scalable systems, algorithms, and tools to support machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence solutions.Lifecycle management using Docker and containerization.Experience with Snowflake, AWS, Hadoop, and/or Spark.Excellent pattern recognition and predictive modeling skills.Extracting data and delivering complete analytics and machine learning products primarily using Python; secondary experience with R, Java, Javascript, C, C++, Scala, or Julia is an asset.Work closely with other data scientists, data engineers, and systems/infrastructure teams to deploy end-to-end models capable of serving production traffic in real-time.Develop, integrate and optimize model/AI/ML/DL pipelines.Leverage modern parallel environments, e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, GPU, TPU and FPGA.Design and implement feedback loops for continual model updates and improvementsExperience receiving, converting, and cleansing big data.Visualization or BI tools, such as Tableau, Microstrategy, RapidMiner, or anything Microsoft Power BI.Program, product, or project management experience delivering model and analytics results.Strong background in Linux/Unix/CentOS/MacOS and Windows installation and administration.Keen attention to detail with the ability to effectively prioritize and execute multiple tasks.Ability to read, write, speak and understand English.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSJupyter Notebooks, NVIDIA GPU-based Deep Learning, and NVIDIA RAPIDS.Familiarity with APIs: Javascript API, Rest API or Data Extract APIs.Familiarity with data workflow/data prep platforms, such as Alteryx, Pentaho, or KNIME.Familiarity with DevOps/CI/CD/automation/configuration/orchestration management using Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Airflow, or equivalents.Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service.Knowledge of Agile, Scrum, and SAFe environments. Experience delivering within these environment a plus.EducationBachelor's degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field required.Master’s degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field preferred.Related Work Experience3-5+ years of experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, recommendation systems, natural language processing, fraud detection or artificial intelligence3-5+ years of experience of lifecycle management in one or more of the following from idea to deployment: artificial intelligence, deep learning models, machine learning models, recommendation systems, natural language processing, or fraud detection.3-5+ years of experience in data engineering position and/or software development.Experience delivering multiple systems where candidate was responsible for designing the architecture, implementing, operating, supporting, and managing the release lifecycle from inception to end of life.7-10+ years of hands-on working experience with Python, RDBMS, SQL, scripting, and coding.Proven experience in translating insights into business recommendations.WORKING CONDITIONSCharter Technical Engineering CenterHighly collaborative and innovative work spaceOccasional Travel "]

['', 'The Associate Data Scientist employs big data technologies and analytics techniques to process and analyze large amounts of data to derive insights and predictions that help improve business decisions.  In order to do this, the Associate Data Scientist must be able to organize data, cleanse and normalize raw data, process data for statistical modeling using computers, and identify relationships and trends in data. The Associate Data Scientist must demonstrate strong programming skills and be able to develop, test, and deploy solutions that address different business problems. The Associate Data Scientist must have a strong educational foundation in data analytics, statistical modeling, advanced machine learning, artificial intelligence, database technology, computer programming, and software engineering. TheAssociate Data Scientist must be able to think analytically, and must be detail-oriented.  Also, the Associate Data Scientistshould be able to effectively communicate with supervisors and business leaders who may not have strong data analytics or statistical background.  \xa0The Associate Data Scientist will usually work independently with guidance provided by the senior team members. ', 'a PhD (or foreign equivalent degree) in Biomedical Engineering, a Life Science, Computer Science, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in a related position.', 'developing Cloud based solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS) for data computation and analytics models; ', ' bachelor’s degree (or foreign equivalent degree) in Biomedical Engineering, a Life Science, Computer Science, or a related field plus seven (7) years of post-baccalaureate and progressively responsible experience in a related position; or) ', 'gathering, analyzing and interpreting functional specifications and user requirements;']

Our client’s mission is to improve health. Due to rapid growth, our client is hiring multiple ML Data Scientists.\xa0', 'Skills:', 'The complex chronic care group within clinical analytics employs cutting-edge ML, signal analysis, and time-series modeling to move the needle on healthcare using claims, commercial pharmacy, and front- end store data. job_title: Lead Machine Learning Engineer (SQL, Python & Linux)
job_text: ['', 'Example Projects Include', 'Data Science platform and infrastructure.', 'Experience with workflow management solutions such as Prefect, Airflow, Azkaban, or Luigi and scalable ETL in batch and stream processing workloads in Spark, Hadoop', 'Building modules for our “Match Engine” ecosystem', 'Production engineering experience is highly desired including previous experience developing and maintaining high-availability search and/or machine learning services. ', 'Excellent verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaborators', 'Qualifications', 'Excellent verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaboratorsBS with 8+ years or MS with 6+ years or PhD with 3+ years of experience. Degree(s) should be in a technical discipline such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, quantitative social sciencePrevious experience in machine learning, and statistics fundamentalsProduction engineering experience is highly desired including previous experience developing and maintaining high-availability search and/or machine learning services. Experience as a tech lead for these types of projects is preferredExperience with distributed systems componentry including Kubernetes or other container management, SQL and NoSQL databases, caching layers (Redis, Memcached), compute in Spark or Hadoop, queueing (Kafka, Kinesis, SNS), cloud-based databases (BigQuery, Athena, Redshift)Experience with workflow management solutions such as Prefect, Airflow, Azkaban, or Luigi and scalable ETL in batch and stream processing workloads in Spark, HadoopRequired: SQL, Python, linux shell scriptingBonus Points: Scala, Java, Go, or RubyExperience with production ready machine learning packages such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, SparkML and/or natural language frameworks such as SpaCy or NLTK.Frequent user of cloud computing platforms such as Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud PlatformDouble Bonus Points: previous work on medical applications and/or with claims data', 'About Us', 'Data Science platform and infrastructure. You will play a critical role building tools and infrastructure to support Grand Rounds’ vision to be a personal healthcare assistant to our members. A key focus area will involve reshaping and extending our brand new Data Science platform. This multipurpose Spark-based ecosystem will enrich our view of providers and patients through machine learning driven inference and population health statistics. The tooling developed will support a combination of modeling, experimentation, and measurement capabilities to build a rich algorithmic understanding of the clinical needs of our members, the value and efficacy of GR interventions and the propensities for utilization. You will work closely with our Data Engineering and Platform teams, as well as data scientists, to ensure robust modeling and data delivery systems that operate at the required scale and velocity. ', 'Experience with production ready machine learning packages such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, SparkML and/or natural language frameworks such as SpaCy or NLTK.', 'Frequent user of cloud computing platforms such as Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Platform', 'The Role', 'Experience with distributed systems componentry including Kubernetes or other container management, SQL and NoSQL databases, caching layers (Redis, Memcached), compute in Spark or Hadoop, queueing (Kafka, Kinesis, SNS), cloud-based databases (BigQuery, Athena, Redshift)', 'Structuring data from medical text. Grand Rounds provides more types of care to a broader pool of members than ever before, and we are expanding our ability to process text generated by these encounters to yield structured data. This effort is to help our Care Team scale and generate new insights on our patient population. You will apply a mixture of pipeline expertise, natural language processing, data warehousing, and healthcare domain knowledge to accurately identify and surface information from medical notes. ', 'BS with 8+ years or MS with 6+ years or PhD with 3+ years of experience. Degree(s) should be in a technical discipline such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, quantitative social science', 'Required: SQL, Python, linux shell scriptingBonus Points: Scala, Java, Go, or Ruby', 'Previous experience in machine learning, and statistics fundamentals', 'Building modules for our “Match Engine” ecosystem. This collection of services powers our provider matching backend in terms of distributed runtime and deployment services. As data scientists across our team are constantly developing new models and features that will help patients immediately, we aim to publish these into our own integrated platform. You will help solidify, grow, and lead the evolution of the end-to-end systems architecture. As a user-facing real-time prediction environment, we take seriously the notions of instrumentation, optimization of both models and orchestration code, as well as the construction and integration of online and offline experimentation frameworks.', 'Grand Rounds is an Equal Opportunity Employer and considers applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetics or any other basis forbidden under federal, state, or local law. Grand Rounds considers all qualified applicants in accordance with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.', 'Structuring data from medical text. ', 'Double Bonus Points: previous work on medical applications and/or with claims data', '.', 'Experience as a tech lead for these types of projects is preferred', 'Data Science platform and infrastructure. You will play a critical role building tools and infrastructure to support Grand Rounds’ vision to be a personal healthcare assistant to our members. A key focus area will involve reshaping and extending our brand new Data Science platform. This multipurpose Spark-based ecosystem will enrich our view of providers and patients through machine learning driven inference and population health statistics. The tooling developed will support a combination of modeling, experimentation, and measurement capabilities to build a rich algorithmic understanding of the clinical needs of our members, the value and efficacy of GR interventions and the propensities for utilization. You will work closely with our Data Engineering and Platform teams, as well as data scientists, to ensure robust modeling and data delivery systems that operate at the required scale and velocity. Structuring data from medical text. Grand Rounds provides more types of care to a broader pool of members than ever before, and we are expanding our ability to process text generated by these encounters to yield structured data. This effort is to help our Care Team scale and generate new insights on our patient population. You will apply a mixture of pipeline expertise, natural language processing, data warehousing, and healthcare domain knowledge to accurately identify and surface information from medical notes. Building modules for our “Match Engine” ecosystem. This collection of services powers our provider matching backend in terms of distributed runtime and deployment services. As data scientists across our team are constantly developing new models and features that will help patients immediately, we aim to publish these into our own integrated platform. You will help solidify, grow, and lead the evolution of the end-to-end systems architecture. As a user-facing real-time prediction environment, we take seriously the notions of instrumentation, optimization of both models and orchestration code, as well as the construction and integration of online and offline experimentation frameworks.']

['', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', "What You'll Bring:", 'Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Robotics, ECE, Computer Science, or a related field.', 'Collect data and analyze the results of benchmarks, road, and regression tests.', 'Develop perception algorithms to detect and identify objects, etc. for autonomous driving systems.', 'Flexible and creative thinking.', 'Develop perception algorithms to detect and identify objects, etc. for autonomous driving systems.Collect data and analyze the results of benchmarks, road, and regression tests.Partner with colleagues to design innovative algorithms in motion planning, and control.Integrate perception software into prototype autonomous driving systems.', 'Partner with colleagues to design innovative algorithms in motion planning, and control.', 'About Us\xa0', 'Experience with mathematical modeling.', 'Experience with simulation environments', "What You'll Do:", '\ufeff', 'About Us', 'Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Robotics, ECE, Computer Science, or a related field.Experience with Radar, LiDAR, computer vision, sensor fusion, probabilistic perception, point cloud processing, object tracking, data association, optimization, and/or machine learning is a plus.5+ years of experience in C++, Python, or other programming languages.Experience with MATLAB.Experience with mathematical modeling.Experience with simulation environmentsStrong problem-solving skills with the ability to learn.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Flexible and creative thinking.', 'Experience with Radar, LiDAR, computer vision, sensor fusion, probabilistic perception, point cloud processing, object tracking, data association, optimization, and/or machine learning is a plus.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.', 'Headquartered in Boston, Motional has operations in the US and Asia. For more information, visit www.Motional.com and follow us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.', 'Integrate perception software into prototype autonomous driving systems.', 'Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to learn.', 'Our Principal Research Scientist will play a key role in making the vehicle of the future a reality by developing technologies that deliver a turnkey, fully autonomous driving system for our customers, and enable Mobility on Demand (MoD). As we expand our global footprint, we are looking for exceptional perception engineering talent to research and apply innovative solutions to our products. Do you enjoy working with prototypes? Do you have a knack for developing algorithms to identify objects and occlusions? If the answers are yes, we’re looking for you.', '5+ years of experience in C++, Python, or other programming languages.', 'About this position:', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.\xa0', 'Our team is commercializing a world-class driverless system. The Motional team is behind some of the industry’s largest leaps forward in the last decade, including the first fully-autonomous cross-country drive in the U.S, the launch of the world’s first robotaxi pilot, and operation of the world’s most-established public robotaxi fleet. Strategically formed by Hyundai Motor Group, one of the world’s largest vehicle manufacturers offering smart mobility solutions, and Aptiv, a global technology leader in advanced safety, electrification, and vehicle connectivity, Motional is fundamentally changing how people move through their lives.\xa0', 'Experience with MATLAB.']

['', 'About The Institute For Protein Design', ' Doctoral Degree in Biochemistry, Computational Biology or Computer Science + 3 or more years of experience in related field.', 'Application Process', 'Desired', ' Develop new machine learning algorithms for protein structure prediction and design.', ' Collaborate with other research staff, postdoctoral fellows and graduate students on computational protein structure prediction and de novo protein design.', ' Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Trains others in how to use Rosetta software and protein design computing infrastructure.', 'Minimum Requirements', ' Uses expert knowledge and judgment to develop new methods and tools for protein structure prediction and design.In this role, ~90% of the effort will be dedicated to computational algorithm development for protein structure prediction and design. The remaining ~10% of effort will be dedicated to preparing technical reports, publications in scientific journals and presenting project results to stakeholders.Minimum Requirements', ' Communicate with the Rosetta community to solicit and address feedback.', ' RESEARCH SCIENTIST 3', ' Computational protein structure prediction and design with Rosetta, development of machine learning algorithms for protein structure prediction, various software languages and data base architectures, ability to work independently and in teams.Desired', 'The Primary Responsibilities Of The RES3 Are', ' Participate in projects with uncertain outcomes requiring analysis from multiple perspectives.', ' Manages complex multi-task projects directed at improving computational protein structure prediction and design.', ' Develop new machine learning algorithms for protein structure prediction and design.  Communicate with the Rosetta community to solicit and address feedback.  Collaborate with other research staff, postdoctoral fellows and graduate students on computational protein structure prediction and de novo protein design.  Participate in projects with uncertain outcomes requiring analysis from multiple perspectives.  Trains others in how to use Rosetta software and protein design computing infrastructure.  Manages complex multi-task projects directed at improving computational protein structure prediction and design.  Uses expert knowledge and judgment to develop new methods and tools for protein structure prediction and design.In this role, ~90% of the effort will be dedicated to computational algorithm development for protein structure prediction and design. The remaining ~10% of effort will be dedicated to preparing technical reports, publications in scientific journals and presenting project results to stakeholders.Minimum Requirements  Doctoral Degree in Biochemistry, Computational Biology or Computer Science + 3 or more years of experience in related field.  Computational protein structure prediction and design with Rosetta, development of machine learning algorithms for protein structure prediction, various software languages and data base architectures, ability to work independently and in teams.Desired  Deep learning algorithm development, Network development, Cross-platform (Linux/Windows/macOS) development, Experience in computational protein structure prediction, and design with Rosetta molecular design and modeling algorithmsApplication ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Work Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed. ['', 'A Bachelor level university/college degree in graphic design, visual communications, industrial design, design strategy or equivalent degree.', 'A Bachelor level university/college degree in graphic design, visual communications, industrial design, design strategy or equivalent degree.3-5+ years Experience working experience in user experience design, visual design, or similar role including designing solutions for desktop, web and mobile applications on variety platforms. Experience with agile/scrum environmentsUsing standard discipline-focused software tools (Adobe Creative Cloud, Sketch, Axure, and related applications)Excellent writing and communication skillsGeneral Understanding of the development required to fulfill coding of designed experiences', 'Excellent visual design skills, layout, typography, and colors.', 'Excellent writing and communication skills', 'UX ResearcherWe have an opening for a UX Designer to work a short-term project that may extend for an additional 6-12 months. Start-Date: ASAP Contract Length: 6 Months (May Extend to 12) Location: Plymouth, MN (Remote for now) Schedule: 9:00am-5:00pm TOP SKILLS Curiosity Desire to learn & make an impact Usability testing Information architecture CMS (Episerver) JOB SUMMARY: As the User Experience Researcher, you will work with product teams to analyze and optimize user-centered designs and workflows in support of programs of major importance for each of our digital properties. You will lead and support experience design to bring to life strategies, applications, and user interface platforms across the clients ecosystem. Optimize the user journey(s) through data analysis, testing, surveys, etc. Work with Analytics to ensure strategy & design are based on data. Develop prototypes and test plans to support learning & validation. Create site and page designs, leveraging a design system and brand assets for consumer facing solutions. Develop ideas into creative design solutions based on digital strategy practices. Create presentations for review by management and various internal clients. Work iteratively to optimize past designs, working and reworking flows, page designs and UI to eliminate all friction from the experience. Present design concepts and represent design principles when making recommendations to complementary business groups. Work closely with marketing and development teams to connect the site build with the business need. Be a subject matter expert in best practices for visual and interaction design in responsive, mobile, native and enterprise environments. Your role will involve working both collaboratively and independently to make user-centric creative decisions on how to best present functionality and content across a variety of experiences. ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES: Create world-class user solutions (including interfaces and visual designs) from concept to execution for desktop solutions, web-based products and mobile applications. Handle major new projects in parallel, organize and manage assignments in an agile manner in support of business plans, organizational plans and the clients reputation and brand strategy. Participate in UX design workshops with stakeholders, build high-fidelity interactive prototypes, and conduct concept testing/usability testing and produce reports. Create and/or translate wireframes into visual designs that are visually engaging, simple and intuitive. Convey design ideas in tangible forms like concepts and annotated comps. Communicate design concepts effectively, build consensus, and justify decisions. Develop visual and interaction design languages and systems including layouts, grids, photography, iconography, UI elements and others. Apply visual language to the design of web interfaces and mobile applications for variety of devices with different screen sizes, aspect ratios and pixel densities. Willingness to be fearless about driving new ideas, and finding beautiful and powerful ways to communicate them. Work directly with Business partners and Product Owners to capture creative goals, opportunities, and branding standards. SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE:', 'General Understanding of the development required to fulfill coding of designed experiences', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'B.S. in Design, Visual Communications, or a related field or equivalent practical experience.', 'Ability to create design prototypes in Adobe Xd, Sketch, Invision, Axure or mobile platforms.', 'UX Researcher', ' SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE:', 'PREFERRED:', 'ManpowerGroup is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)', 'B.S. in Design, Visual Communications, or a related field or equivalent practical experience.Experience with creating web-based products, mobile applications for iOS and Android.Excellent visual design skills, layout, typography, and colors.Ability to create design prototypes in Adobe Xd, Sketch, Invision, Axure or mobile platforms.', '3-5+ years Experience working experience in user experience design, visual design, or similar role including designing solutions for desktop, web and mobile applications on variety platforms. ', 'Experience with agile/scrum environments', 'TOP SKILLS', ' ', 'Using standard discipline-focused software tools (Adobe Creative Cloud, Sketch, Axure, and related applications)', 'JOB SUMMARY:', 'Experience with creating web-based products, mobile applications for iOS and Android.']

engineering is central to what we do. The products we build are breaking new ground, and we have a focus on providing the best environment to allow you to do what you do best - solve problems, collaborate with your team and push first class software. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable and inclusive. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with great people.', 'You know what these things are (in no particular order): logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.', 'Publications in top conferences.', 'Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0', 'You’re a deeply curious person.', 'You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'Strong programming skills in Python.', 'You may be a fit for this role if you:\xa0', 'Today, nearly every business in the world\xa0has to\xa0do bookkeeping and accounting in order to file taxes, understand financial health, and most importantly, make strategic business decisions. The process is universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, the process follows well-defined rules, abides by industry standardization, and has become increasingly\xa0data-rich. It’s a product-focused machine learning team’s dream. Sage Intacct Artificial Intelligence Labs “SAIL” is a nimble team within Sage Intacct building the future of cloud accounting by leveraging artificial intelligence. The SAIL team builds capabilities to help businesses make better decisions through data-powered insights. We are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Scientist in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products\xa0and services. As a part of our cross-functional team, including data scientists and engineers, you will help steer the direction of the entire company’s Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning effort and you will also be a key individual contributor.\xa0', 'Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to team.', 'What it’s like to work here:\xa0', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.Writing production-quality code.Exploratory data analyses and investigations.Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to team.', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.', '4+ years industry experience shipping production machine learning models.']

job_title: Graduate Data Science and Advanced Analytics Internship
job_text: ['', ' 2+ years of experience in a role developing predictive or explanatory models and/or experimentation processes Experience with neural nets and deep architectures preferred Experience with moderate to large-scale data sets (>100GB) preferred Previous experience in working in a product management capacity for data science product Expertise in at least one production-quality programming languages (e.g. java, python, scala, C++)', ' 2+ years of experience in a role developing predictive or explanatory models and/or experimentation processes', ' Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including superior presentation skills', ' Strong technical and analytical skillset required: experience with Microsoft BI, Tableau, SAS, Stata, R, Python, SQL, or Alteryx required; familiarity with Excel and PowerPoint preferred', ' Experience with neural nets and deep architectures preferred', 'What You Bring', ' Prior experience synthesizing and packaging complex analyses and delivering results to non-technical audiences including senior leadership teams', ' Global Operations & Logistics Analytics:', ' Demonstrated ability to use data to influence decision making. Strong project management experience managing multiple project streams and complexity', ' Consumer Data Science:', ' Pursuing an advanced degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g. Master’s or PhD studies in Analytics, Engineering, Economics, Finance, Computer Science, Statistics, etc.) with an expected graduation of Winter 2021 or Spring 2022 Strong technical and analytical skillset required: experience with Microsoft BI, Tableau, SAS, Stata, R, Python, SQL, or Alteryx required; familiarity with Excel and PowerPoint preferred Core mathematical ability to understand, utilize and innovate on state-of-the art machine learning algorithms and/or statistical modeling Ability to project plan, lead, execute and deliver compelling and actionable user research in a face-paced environment, balancing rigor and speed Prior experience synthesizing and packaging complex analyses and delivering results to non-technical audiences including senior leadership teams Proven ability to use strategic tools and frameworks to analyze complex strategic problems, develop clear recommendations and present findings Proven ability to sift through data, identify critical information, develop hypotheses, perform rigorous analyses, and make recommendations to broader audiences Demonstrated ability to use data to influence decision making. ['', ' Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus ', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', ' What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'General office demands', ' Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++ ', ' Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner  Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' What other skills/experience would be helpful to have? ', ' Sense of Urgency - bring an agile, let’s get things done attitude ', ' Title: AI Machine Learning Engineer ', 'Interest in learning about foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning ', ' Curious - willing to learn new things and try new things, able to implement prototypes ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. An MS degree is a plus', ' What are the requirements needed for this position? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. An MS degree is a plus2+ years professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design, implementation, testing, operations, and maintenance Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++  Experience working with modern tools for big data processing and scalable machine learning (e.g., AWS, GCP, Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, SQL, NoSQL)  Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus  Experience with common machine learning libraries and tools: scikit-learn, MXNet, Tensorflow, XGBoost is a plus Interest in learning about foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning ', 'Communicative - Comfortable presenting to other engineers, share ideas and write specifications and other documentation', ' Experience working with modern tools for big data processing and scalable machine learning (e.g., AWS, GCP, Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, SQL, NoSQL) ', '2+ years professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design, implementation, testing, operations, and maintenance', ' Experience with common machine learning libraries and tools: scikit-learn, MXNet, Tensorflow, XGBoost is a plus ', 'Overview Of Position', ' Curious - willing to learn new things and try new things, able to implement prototypes Communicative - Comfortable presenting to other engineers, share ideas and write specifications and other documentation Sense of Urgency - bring an agile, let’s get things done attitude ', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', ' What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job? ']

['\xa0Build machine learning models to predict sales opportunities, streamline manual workflows and analyze results to ensure they align with business objectives ', 'We’ll trust you to: ', 'We’d love to see:', '\xa0Strong analytical, creative problem solving, and communication skills ', 'You need to have:', '\xa0Proficiency in one or more SQL database technologies such as MS SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc. ', 'We’ll trust you to:', '\xa0Contribute to machine learning infrastructure for release management, deployment, testing, and monitoring ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', '\xa02+ year of experience with Machine Learning, statistical models and Natural Language Processing ', '\xa0Proven track record of building and shipping ML pipelines using both supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, classification, and optimization ', '\xa04+ years of professional experience with strong coding skills in one or more of: Python, C++, C#, Java \xa0Strong analytical, creative problem solving, and communication skills ', '\xa04+ years of professional experience with strong coding skills in one or more of: Python, C++, C#, Java ', '\xa0Work with data collection, data cleansing, feature engineering, model selection, training, testing, and deployment ', '\xa0Mathematical background (Probability and Statistics) ', '\xa0Experience and passion working with CRM applications is a plus ', '\xa0Working in a cross-functional Agile team environment', '\xa0Enhance, build, and support innovative full stack applications ', '\xa0MS or PhD degree in Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Design and implement efficient pipelines using data exploration and Natural Language Processing ']

review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Develop POC as needed and help draft the engineering design to be handed over to the dev team\xa0', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent experience\xa0', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0', 'Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0Startup Experience', '3+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0', 'Get involved in customers calls on occasion to discuss future product directions\xa0']

job_text: ['', ' Develop a working knowledge of a wide variety of cell biology concepts relating to cell line generation, cellular models of disease, automated imaging and image analysis ', 'Schedule', 'RESEARCH SCIENTIST III, CELL-BASED ASSAY TECHNOLOGY in Buffalo, NY ', 'Supervisory Responsibilities', ' This position may have direct reports. Record all appropriate data electronically in AMRI databases. ', ' Use of sound judgment, acquired knowledge and experience to develop new in vitro models, protocols & reagents for the identification and prioritization of active samples and determination of drug mechanisms of action. ', 'Job Posting', ' Routine maintenance and quality control testing of cell lines, cell culture instrumentation and imaging equipment ', ' Bachelors or Masters degree with a major in Biology, Pharmacology, Neuroscience, Immunology or Biochemistry and four to five years of relevant experience, or equivalent industrial experience ', ' Experience in a laboratory research setting applying assay development, screening by imaging and imaging data analysis techniques. ', ' Analysis and interpretation of assay development, high-content screening, potency and mechanism of action data ', ' Develop expertise in biochemical, cell-based, high content and multi-parametric assays for bioactivity screening and their transfer to robotic systems for high throughput screening ', ' AMRI provides global contract research and manufacturing services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries. ', ' Bachelors or Masters degree with a major in Biology, Pharmacology, Neuroscience, Immunology or Biochemistry and four to five years of relevant experience, or equivalent industrial experience  Experience in a laboratory research setting applying assay development, screening by imaging and imaging data analysis techniques.  Computer training including use of software associated with data analysis and screening  Other pertinent training/courses ', ' Develop expertise in the analysis of complex data sets including high-content imaging, plate-based fluorescence and luminescence, flow cytometry or multiplex ELISA-based detection. The scientist will be able to write and test complex automated procedures under minimal supervision ', ' Submit acceptable written periodic reports. Prepare summaries of experimental findings reliably and independently. ', ' Develop a working knowledge of a wide variety of cell biology concepts relating to cell line generation, cellular models of disease, automated imaging and image analysis  Use of sound judgment, acquired knowledge and experience to develop new in vitro models, protocols & reagents for the identification and prioritization of active samples and determination of drug mechanisms of action.  Routine maintenance and quality control testing of cell lines, cell culture instrumentation and imaging equipment  Develop expertise in the analysis of complex data sets including high-content imaging, plate-based fluorescence and luminescence, flow cytometry or multiplex ELISA-based detection. The scientist will be able to write and test complex automated procedures under minimal supervision  Develop expertise in biochemical, cell-based, high content and multi-parametric assays for bioactivity screening and their transfer to robotic systems for high throughput screening  Performance of high throughput and secondary screening of sample collections and generation of high quality screening data  Analysis and interpretation of assay development, high-content screening, potency and mechanism of action data  Development and effective application of a broad spectrum of practical laboratory skills; including molecular biology, cell culture, biochemistry, assay development, in depth analysis of imaging data and the use of automated equipment  Keep accurate, legible and complete records of all experiments and observations. Record all appropriate data electronically in AMRI databases.  Submit acceptable written periodic reports. Prepare summaries of experimental findings reliably and independently. ', 'Primary Location', ' Development and effective application of a broad spectrum of practical laboratory skills; including molecular biology, cell culture, biochemistry, assay development, in depth analysis of imaging data and the use of automated equipment ', ' Qualifications and background to be successful in this role: ', 'Shift Type', 'Organization']
