job_title: Staff Data Engineer - World Wide Publishing Technology
job_text: ['', ' Staff Data Engineer on the WWP Technology team', ' Experience working with analytics tools such as Google Analytics and Singular MMP Experience working with digital media and cross-device data from major networks like Facebook and Google Ads Experience with CRM or CDP platforms like Salesforce Marketing Cloud Experience with Google Cloud data ecosystem including BigQuery, Dataflow, Cloudrun, and BigTable ', 'Experience working with digital media and cross-device data from major networks like Facebook and Google Ads', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or comparable experience 6+ years experience in Python, Scala, Java, or similar data processing programming language 3+ years experience with Spark, Hadoop, or Databricks Experience influencing engineering best practices within your team, including design/code reviews, coding standards, source control management, build processes, and testing Experience working collaboratively across multiple teams and customers to accomplish deliverables Experience with data analysis, processing, and validation Experience with SQL, databases, and data pipelining technologies and ETL frameworks Experience implementing data solutions in public cloud technologies including configuration and deployment Experiencing as a leader in making technical decisions (for example: served as Technical Lead across multiple teams) Strong communication and collaboration skills ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or comparable experience', 'Experience with Google Cloud data ecosystem including BigQuery, Dataflow, Cloudrun, and BigTable', 'Experience implementing data solutions in public cloud technologies including configuration and deployment', 'Experience with CRM or CDP platforms like Salesforce Marketing Cloud', 'Responsibilities', 'Required Qualifications', 'Create and implement scalable data models & schemas that power use cases such as predictive data models, advanced reporting and insights, and supporting our customer needs in user acquisition, WWP publishing, & game marketing teams. You will help identify important questions and then provide services, datasets, and tools that empower them to find the answers', '3+ years experience with Spark, Hadoop, or Databricks', 'Experience influencing engineering best practices within your team, including design/code reviews, coding standards, source control management, build processes, and testing', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Owner for technical strategy, architecture, and implementation of the WWP MarTech platform', 'Help developers select data technologies that provide efficient insights with a high return on investment', 'Experience with SQL, databases, and data pipelining technologies and ETL frameworks', 'Experience with data analysis, processing, and validation', 'Experiencing as a leader in making technical decisions (for example: served as Technical Lead across multiple teams)', 'Experience working collaboratively across multiple teams and customers to accomplish deliverables', 'Experience working with analytics tools such as Google Analytics and Singular MMP', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills', 'Design and build tools that provide confidence in our data quality. You will create and oversee mature development processes and systems (i.e. automated tests, staged deployments) to validate our data is always flowing and correctly', '6+ years experience in Python, Scala, Java, or similar data processing programming language', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Our Perks', 'Provide technical leadership and mentor data & software engineers on the WWP Tech team', ' Owner for technical strategy, architecture, and implementation of the WWP MarTech platform Design and build tools that provide confidence in our data quality. You will create and oversee mature development processes and systems (i.e. automated tests, staged deployments) to validate our data is always flowing and correctly Create and implement scalable data models & schemas that power use cases such as predictive data models, advanced reporting and insights, and supporting our customer needs in user acquisition, WWP publishing, & game marketing teams. You will help identify important questions and then provide services, datasets, and tools that empower them to find the answers Help developers select data technologies that provide efficient insights with a high return on investment Provide technical leadership and mentor data & software engineers on the WWP Tech team ']

['Position Requirements', '', 'Assists leadership with strategic planning, resource allocation and guidance to UX associates.', 'Expert in project management and organizational skills.', 'Leads strategic design and execution of user-centered research and usability studies that provide actionable insights which influence design and development of associate, branch team and client systems, tools, applications and processes.', 'Company Description', 'From FORTUNE Magazine, February 15, 2018 © 2018 Time Inc. Used under license. FORTUNE and Time Inc. are not affiliated with and do not endorse products or services of Edward Jones.', 'Posting Location', 'Responds well to direction, embraces feedback and change.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Usability, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology or relevant field.', 'Determines and recommends the most efficient and effective research approaches to solve for business needs and meet agreed-upon objectives, then guides business areas through the appropriate UX process.', 'Expert in both qualitative and quantitative user experience research methodologies.', 'Leads strategic design and execution of user-centered research and usability studies that provide actionable insights which influence design and development of associate, branch team and client systems, tools, applications and processes.Collaborates and supports business areas and objectives that align to firm, division and department priorities and focus on client and user centricity. Designs and executes user research using qualitative and quantitative methods.Determines and recommends the most efficient and effective research approaches to solve for business needs and meet agreed-upon objectives, then guides business areas through the appropriate UX process.Identifies and applies appropriate change management best practices and approach to build rapport, understand user needs, address resistance and reinforce key learnings or results.Monitors UX project execution, including establishing and tracking UX project metrics and conducting evaluations. Identifies, influences, supports and partners with multi-disciplinary teams, including other business areas, to execute UX projects.Takes ownership for self-development, stays current with research techniques and tools in the field of UX.Works with and provides supporting documentation to others that influences product, system or application development and implementation to ensure creation of efficient, sustainable and successful results. Mentors and assists the UX Researchers as it relates to similar UX project needs.Assists leadership with strategic planning, resource allocation and guidance to UX associates.', 'Designs and executes user research using qualitative and quantitative methods.', 'Home based Associate?', 'Monitors UX project execution, including establishing and tracking UX project metrics and conducting evaluations. ', 'Position Schedule', 'Able to expertly research, analyze and consolidate data into trends and share with teams.', 'Identifies and applies appropriate change management best practices and approach to build rapport, understand user needs, address resistance and reinforce key learnings or results.', 'Mentors and assists the UX Researchers as it relates to similar UX project needs.', 'Takes ownership for self-development, stays current with research techniques and tools in the field of UX.', 'Opportunity Overview', '5+ years of User Experience research experience.', 'Identifies, influences, supports and partners with multi-disciplinary teams, including other business areas, to execute UX projects.', 'EEO Statement', 'Collaborates and supports business areas and objectives that align to firm, division and department priorities and focus on client and user centricity. ', 'Presents ideas, thoughts, arguments, and information persuasively. ['', 'Educational Opportunities within the first year of employment include: ', 'Education & Experience Requirements', 'Our laboratory consist of both Medical Technologist and Medical Laboratory Technicians both of whom are certified by and accrediting agency and licensed by the State of Louisiana. Technologists work as a team in multiple areas such as: Blood Bank, Chemistry, Coagulation, Hematology, Microbiology, Serology, and Urinalysis. Technologists have the opportunity to apply a broad range of lab expertise and gain invaluable experience as a generalist.', 'Job Purpose Or Mission', 'Performs routine and special clinical laboratory tests on patient specimens, correlates and interprets data based on knowledge of techniques, principles and instruments. Investigates problems, performs corrective and preventive maintenance of equipment, prepares reagents, and performs data entry of test results. Responsibilities include applying clinical laboratory techniques in accordance with standardized methodology. ', 'Our Core Lab has an automated line for receiving, centrifuging, routing, testing, and storage of lab specimens. Total automation has allowed more efficient use of our technologist time to concentrate on those duties that require their professional expertise, such as quality improvement processes and high complexity testing.']

['PhD from a world-leading university in a relevant field (NLP, Machine Learning, Statistics, Computer Science etc)', 'With tens of billions of dollars in assets under management, my client is one of the most successful and influential quantitative finance institutions globally. They boast an elite, collaborative team of Machine Learning and NLP Researchers. Including a previous "big 5 tech firm" Chief AI Scientist, Scientists from Facebook/Amazon and PhDs from UC Berkeley, MIT, CMU, University of Montreal and University of Washington.', 'PhD from a world-leading university in a relevant field (NLP, Machine Learning, Statistics, Computer Science etc)Significant NLP research (text) experience with at least 2 years’ experience developing models/algorithms to make sense out of unstructured/noisy datasetsTrack record of research excellence through accepted papers at NAACL, EMNLP, NeurIPS, ICML etc', 'Track record of research excellence through accepted papers at NAACL, EMNLP, NeurIPS, ICML etc', 'Significant NLP research (text) experience with at least 2 years’ experience developing models/algorithms to make sense out of unstructured/noisy datasets', 'My client is looking for a world-class NLP researcher to join their team to develop models capable of automating their research process. Here, you will be offered access to unparalleled unstructured datasets and high-impact work - where your research and deployed models will present results instantaneously. If this sounds interesting to you, please get in touch and I will be able to disclose more information directly.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Requirements']

['Position Requirements', '', 'Assists leadership with strategic planning, resource allocation and guidance to UX associates.', 'Expert in project management and organizational skills.', 'Leads strategic design and execution of user-centered research and usability studies that provide actionable insights which influence design and development of associate, branch team and client systems, tools, applications and processes.', 'Company Description', 'From FORTUNE Magazine, February 15, 2018 © 2018 Time Inc. Used under license. FORTUNE and Time Inc. are not affiliated with and do not endorse products or services of Edward Jones.', 'Posting Location', 'Responds well to direction, embraces feedback and change.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Usability, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology or relevant field.', 'Determines and recommends the most efficient and effective research approaches to solve for business needs and meet agreed-upon objectives, then guides business areas through the appropriate UX process.', 'Expert in both qualitative and quantitative user experience research methodologies.', 'Leads strategic design and execution of user-centered research and usability studies that provide actionable insights which influence design and development of associate, branch team and client systems, tools, applications and processes.Collaborates and supports business areas and objectives that align to firm, division and department priorities and focus on client and user centricity. Designs and executes user research using qualitative and quantitative methods.Determines and recommends the most efficient and effective research approaches to solve for business needs and meet agreed-upon objectives, then guides business areas through the appropriate UX process.Identifies and applies appropriate change management best practices and approach to build rapport, understand user needs, address resistance and reinforce key learnings or results.Monitors UX project execution, including establishing and tracking UX project metrics and conducting evaluations. Identifies, influences, supports and partners with multi-disciplinary teams, including other business areas, to execute UX projects.Takes ownership for self-development, stays current with research techniques and tools in the field of UX.Works with and provides supporting documentation to others that influences product, system or application development and implementation to ensure creation of efficient, sustainable and successful results. Mentors and assists the UX Researchers as it relates to similar UX project needs.Assists leadership with strategic planning, resource allocation and guidance to UX associates.', 'Designs and executes user research using qualitative and quantitative methods.', 'Home based Associate?', 'Monitors UX project execution, including establishing and tracking UX project metrics and conducting evaluations. ', 'Position Schedule', 'Able to expertly research, analyze and consolidate data into trends and share with teams.', 'Identifies and applies appropriate change management best practices and approach to build rapport, understand user needs, address resistance and reinforce key learnings or results.', 'Mentors and assists the UX Researchers as it relates to similar UX project needs.', 'Takes ownership for self-development, stays current with research techniques and tools in the field of UX.', 'Opportunity Overview', '5+ years of User Experience research experience.', 'Identifies, influences, supports and partners with multi-disciplinary teams, including other business areas, to execute UX projects.', 'EEO Statement', 'Collaborates and supports business areas and objectives that align to firm, division and department priorities and focus on client and user centricity. These 19 FORTUNE rankings include top 10 finishes for 15 years, top 5 rankings for eight years and consecutive No. 1 rankings in 2002 and 2003.', 'Position Type']

['', ' Contribute to proposal submissions within the Nuclear Data and Theory group, including DOE Topical Collaborations in Nuclear Theory.', '2020 Best Places to ', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', ' Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Demonstrated skills in statistical analysis applied to uncertainty quantification.', ' Experience developing methods of performing perturbative QCD calculations.', 'Security Clearance: ', ' Ability to work effectively in a collaborative and multidisciplinary team environment.', 'Qualifications', ' Experience conducting research in perturbative QCD, particularly in heavy flavor physics.', ' Demonstrated publication record in peer-reviewed literature with experience presenting research results to a large audience.', ' Pursue research in perturbative QCD with an emphasis on intrinsic charm in the proton.', 'About Us', ' Ability to perform independent research and find innovative solutions to scientific and technical problems.', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', ' Pursue research on open heavy flavor and quarkonium production in p+p/p+A and e+p/e+A collisions.', 'Desired Qualifications', ' Engage with experimental collaborations.', ' Pursue research in perturbative QCD with an emphasis on intrinsic charm in the proton. Pursue research on open heavy flavor and quarkonium production in p+p/p+A and e+p/e+A collisions. Engage with experimental collaborations. Make predictions for intrinsic charm signals at the Electron Ion Collider. Pursue independent research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internal and external to LLNL. Report research results through publications in peer-reviewed journals and conference presentations. Contribute to proposal submissions within the Nuclear Data and Theory group, including DOE Topical Collaborations in Nuclear Theory. Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Demonstrated publication record in peer-reviewed literature with experience presenting research results to a large audience. Demonstrated skills in statistical analysis applied to uncertainty quantification.', ' Proficient verbal and written communication skills needed to effectively present and explain results of scientific research.', 'Note: ', ' Experience with computer programming.', ' Report research results through publications in peer-reviewed journals and conference presentations.', 'Essential Duties', 'Work by Glassdoor!', ' Ph.D. in physics or related field.', ' Make predictions for intrinsic charm signals at the Electron Ion Collider.', ' Ph.D. in physics or related field. Experience conducting research in perturbative QCD, particularly in heavy flavor physics. Experience developing methods of performing perturbative QCD calculations. Experience with computer programming. Ability to perform independent research and find innovative solutions to scientific and technical problems. Proficient verbal and written communication skills needed to effectively present and explain results of scientific research. Ability to work effectively in a collaborative and multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Pursue independent research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internal and external to LLNL.']

['', ' Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus ', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner ', 'Pursue purpose. ', 'General office demands', ' Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++ ', ' Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner  Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' What other skills/experience would be helpful to have? It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. ['', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality C++ and Python code ', '\xa0Deep learning and distributional semantics, preferably with practical experience using at least one DL framework like TensorFlow or PyTorch ', '\xa0Formal computational semantics ', 'We build systems that enable our clients to ask the Terminal complex questions in natural language. We tackle a range of challenging problems in NLP that require sharp research instincts and solid engineering skills. We are looking for research scientists and software engineers with NLP experience, and specifically with a background and interest in one or more of the following areas:\xa0 ', 'We are excited to meet researchers/engineers who want to be part of a team making a big impact and are not afraid to get their hands dirty in data. ', '\xa0Syntactic and semantic parsing (e.g., top-down, bottom-up, charts, dependency parsing, PCFGs, semantic-driven parsing based on CCGs and the lambda calculus, etc.) ', '\xa0General statistical NLP (sequence labeling algorithms, language models, etc.) ', '\xa0Publish in leading academic venues and represent Bloomberg at industry conferences ', '\xa0 ', "You'll need to have: ", '\xa0General statistical NLP (sequence labeling algorithms, language models, etc.) \xa0Syntactic and semantic parsing (e.g., top-down, bottom-up, charts, dependency parsing, PCFGs, semantic-driven parsing based on CCGs and the lambda calculus, etc.) \xa0Formal computational semantics \xa0Deep learning and distributional semantics, preferably with practical experience using at least one DL framework like TensorFlow or PyTorch \xa0Ontologies and knowledge engineering, particularly as used in knowledge graphs for question answering ', "\xa0Master's/Ph.D degree, or equivalent industry experience ", '\xa0Solid background in natural language processing and/or machine learning (as outlined above) ', '\xa0Design and build systems that solve difficult problems in NLP and particularly in QA ', '\xa0Familiarity with C++ is strongly preferred, and functional language programming (ML, Haskell, Scala, etc.) is a big plus.', '\xa0Strong Computer Science fundamentals (algorithms, data structures) ', "We'll trust you to: ", ' ', '\xa0Ontologies and knowledge engineering, particularly as used in knowledge graphs for question answering ']

['Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of machine learning frameworksPrior exposure to putting models into productionHave a background in Health care', '', 'This is an opportunity for an experienced Data Scientist to come into a well-established start-up and work on strategic and technical work. You would be working hands-on, developing cutting edge machine learning models as well as speaking directly to clients.', 'You will be working client-facing', 'New York – New York', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.', '\xa0', 'Prior exposure to putting models into production', 'This is a well-established start up that just received over $150m in funding. They work in the healthtech space and deliver machine learning solutions to patient-focused needs across the health care industry.', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.You will be working client-facing', 'Please register your interest by sending your résumé to Elizabeth Sobel via the Apply link on this page.', '$170,000', 'You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.', 'Have a background in Health care', 'Senior Data Scientist', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of machine learning frameworks', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. You will also need a background in the health care space, as to have an understanding of their clients.\xa0', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'THE BENEFITS', 'THE ROLE', 'With great funding and the ability to work through their own projects, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and deep learning techniques that focus on helping people in the health care space. As a senior data scientist you will provide technical expertise and client-facing abilities.', 'An extremely competitive base salary of $170,000 plus benefits']

['', 'As a Deep Learning Scientist, you’ll find yourself working closely with leaders in machine learning and AI research. This is a large,\xa0multi-billion dollar company that develops products that you see on store shelves every single day.', 'Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.', '\xa0', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of deep learning frameworks', 'Prior exposure to putting models into production', 'Please register your interest by sending your\xa0résumé\xa0to Elizabeth\xa0Sobel\xa0via the Apply link on this page.', 'A base salary of $100,000-120,000', 'You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of deep learning frameworksPrior exposure to putting models into productionHave a background in computer science, statistics, or engineeringPrevious work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning', 'Have a background in computer science, statistics, or engineering', 'Cincinnati, OH', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting deep learning projects into production is a must,', 'Deep Learning Scientist', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'THE BENEFITS', 'With great funding and the ability to work through their own projects, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and deep learning techniques on both the research and development side. As a deep learning engineer on this team, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying\xa0analytical\xa0techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.You will be working with other engineers and the computer vision team on a data driven approach to solving problems on a project to project base.', '$100,000-120,000 + excellent benefits package', 'THE ROLE', 'You will be working with other engineers and the computer vision team on a data driven approach to solving problems on a project to project base.', 'This is an opportunity for a pure Deep Learning\xa0Scientist\xa0to cut their teeth in a data-first fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure in the world of consumer goods. If you are looking for the chance to take your skills to the next level and work in an environment where your work with produce actionable commercial result – this is the role for you.', 'THE COMPANY']

['You have an MS      or preferably PhD Degree in Computer Science or related field ', 'Medical, Dental,      Vision Insurance ', 'Performance      based bonus incentive ', 'This multi-billion-dollar industry conglomerate is looking to bring in intelligent, passionate, top notch cloud-based data engineers to join their innovative and expansive brand to help grow their R&D Analytics branch to inform various major business decisions. ', ' $120,000 -      $140,000 annual base compensation dependent on experience level  Performance      based bonus incentive  Medical, Dental,      Vision Insurance  401K  Flexible      PTO/Vacation Days  ', 'You have      conceptual understanding of NLP, ML ', 'Flexible      PTO/Vacation Days ', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'Interact with      various business stakeholders to understand necessary requirements and      data needed to assist on marketing optimization, pricing, personalization,      and predictive modelling ', 'As a Cloud Data Engineer, you will be in charge of building out end to end projects enabling further growth and insights for various markets and branches connected to the overall business. ['A passion for working with data and developing software to address data processing challenges ', 'Data Engineers are the architects of the next generation platforms that control how the firm interacts with and consumes information. They own the entire data pipeline starting with how we ingest data from the outside world, through the transformation of data into actionable insights, and finally the interfaces and APIs that our analysts and portfolio managers use to monetize that information. Throughout that process our data engineers work closely with investment professionals and researchers to design systems that answer some of the most challenging questions in the hedge fund industry. ', 'Required Skills ', 'Prior work developing BI tooling and/or application development for data analytics ', 'Proficiency with Python, C++, Java or equivalent ', 'Enterprise Data Engineers build pipelines that support datasets used by all investment teams and strategies across the firm. They manage the firm’s most critical data sets and focus on applying software development best practices to solve complex data challenges. The expectation is that the data engineer has sound programming skills, strong business acumen, and a strong interest in finance. ', 'Prior experience building data pipelines from structured or unstructured data preferably including web crawlers ', 'Develop solutions that enable internal analysts to efficiently extract insights from data. This includes owning the ingestion (web scrapes, S3/FTP sync, bespoke processes), transformations (Python, Perl) and interface (API, schema design, events, etc.) Build tooling and automation around data pipelines that improve the efficiency, quality and resiliency of our data platform Partner with internal analysts, quants and data scientists to design, develop, test and deploy solutions that answer fundamental questions about financial markets. Take on an entrepreneurial mentality by building and selling your own ideas. We work in an evolving space and we expect you to help design our evolution by challenging the status quo and independently identifying opportunities to improve the entire data organization. ', '\xa0 ', 'Develop solutions that enable internal analysts to efficiently extract insights from data. This includes owning the ingestion (web scrapes, S3/FTP sync, bespoke processes), transformations (Python, Perl) and interface (API, schema design, events, etc.) ', 'Proficiency with RDBMS, NoSQL, distributed compute platforms such as Spark, Dask or Hadoop ', 'A passion for working with data and developing software to address data processing challenges Proficiency with Python, C++, Java or equivalent Proficiency with RDBMS, NoSQL, distributed compute platforms such as Spark, Dask or Hadoop Prior experience building data pipelines from structured or unstructured data preferably including web crawlers Prior work developing BI tooling and/or application development for data analytics Advanced technical communication skills Working knowledge of statistics, predictive analytics or machine learning techniques Strong business acumen with prior experience in investment research or direct exposure to product or data science teams AND passionate about using data for investment decisions', 'New York, NY ', 'Take on an entrepreneurial mentality by building and selling your own ideas. We work in an evolving space and we expect you to help design our evolution by challenging the status quo and independently identifying opportunities to improve the entire data organization. ', 'Required Skills', 'Key Responsibilities ', 'New York, NY', 'Partner with internal analysts, quants and data scientists to design, develop, test and deploy solutions that answer fundamental questions about financial markets. ', 'Enterprise Data Engineer', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Advanced technical communication skills ', 'Strong business acumen with prior experience in investment research or direct exposure to product or data science teams AND passionate about using data for investment decisions', 'Enterprise Data Engineer ', 'Working knowledge of statistics, predictive analytics or machine learning techniques ', 'Build tooling and automation around data pipelines that improve the efficiency, quality and resiliency of our data platform ']

Our environment is highly collaborative and open, fostering innovation and growth. ['', ' Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus ', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', ' What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'General office demands', ' Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++ ', ' Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner  Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' What other skills/experience would be helpful to have? ', ' Sense of Urgency - bring an agile, let’s get things done attitude ', ' Title: AI Machine Learning Engineer ', 'Interest in learning about foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning ', ' Curious - willing to learn new things and try new things, able to implement prototypes ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. An MS degree is a plus', ' What are the requirements needed for this position? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. An MS degree is a plus2+ years professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design, implementation, testing, operations, and maintenance Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++  Experience working with modern tools for big data processing and scalable machine learning (e.g., AWS, GCP, Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, SQL, NoSQL)  Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus  Experience with common machine learning libraries and tools: scikit-learn, MXNet, Tensorflow, XGBoost is a plus Interest in learning about foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning ', 'Communicative - Comfortable presenting to other engineers, share ideas and write specifications and other documentation', ' Experience working with modern tools for big data processing and scalable machine learning (e.g., AWS, GCP, Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, SQL, NoSQL) ', '2+ years professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design, implementation, testing, operations, and maintenance', ' Experience with common machine learning libraries and tools: scikit-learn, MXNet, Tensorflow, XGBoost is a plus ', 'Overview Of Position', ' Curious - willing to learn new things and try new things, able to implement prototypes Communicative - Comfortable presenting to other engineers, share ideas and write specifications and other documentation Sense of Urgency - bring an agile, let’s get things done attitude ', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', ' What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job? ']

job_title: Organic Chemist for Machine Learning - Postdoctoral Researcher
job_text: ['', ' Evaluate state-of-the-art computational tools that aide in synthesis strategies.', ' Elucidate via a combination of wet lab and machine learning statistical techniques the underlying chemistry-function relationships to guide improvements in molecular design and synthesis.', ' Experience with one or more deep learning libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe or Theano.', ' Maintain and establish laboratory protocols.', '2020 Best Places to ', ' Design, implement, analyze, and resolve synthetic problems and establish solutions leading to the preparation and purification of organic materials that meet the desired specifications. This work includes use of a Schlenk line, glovebox, LC/LCMS, GCMS, XRD, DSC, NMR, FTIR, Raman, amongst other common analysis tools and techniques in organic chemistry synthesis. Evaluate state-of-the-art computational tools that aide in synthesis strategies. Elucidate via a combination of wet lab and machine learning statistical techniques the underlying chemistry-function relationships to guide improvements in molecular design and synthesis. Contribute to and actively participate in the conception, design and execution of research to address defined problems. Pursue independent but complementary research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internally and externally to the Laboratory. Collaborate with scientists in a multidisciplinary team environment to accomplish research goals. Maintain and establish laboratory protocols. Document research; publish papers in peer-reviewed journals, and present results within the DOE community and at conferences. Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Broad experience with organic small molecule synthesis and wet lab chemistry techniques.', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', ' Document research; publish papers in peer-reviewed journals, and present results within the DOE community and at conferences.', ' Ability and willingness to travel.', ' Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Experience with one or more deep learning libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe or Theano. Experience with energetic materials, including handling and synthesis. Experience applying algorithms in one or more of the following Machine Learning areas/tasks: deep learning, unsupervised feature learning, zero- or few-shot learning, active learning, reinforcement learning, multimodal learning, natural language processing, ensemble methods, scalable online estimation, and probabilistic graphical models.', 'Security Clearance: ', ' Experience with energetic materials, including handling and synthesis.', 'Qualifications', ' PhD in chemistry, materials science, chemical engineering or related field.', ' Contribute to and actively participate in the conception, design and execution of research to address defined problems.', 'About Us', ' Design, implement, analyze, and resolve synthetic problems and establish solutions leading to the preparation and purification of organic materials that meet the desired specifications. This work includes use of a Schlenk line, glovebox, LC/LCMS, GCMS, XRD, DSC, NMR, FTIR, Raman, amongst other common analysis tools and techniques in organic chemistry synthesis.', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', 'Desired Qualifications', ' Experience in one or more higher-level programming languages such as Python, Java/Scala, Matlab, R or C/C++.', 'Note: ', ' Initiative and interpersonal skills with desire and ability to work in a collaborative, multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Proficient verbal and written communication skills as reflected in effective presentations at seminars, meetings and/or teaching lectures.', 'Work by Glassdoor!', ' PhD in chemistry, materials science, chemical engineering or related field. Broad experience with organic small molecule synthesis and wet lab chemistry techniques. Experience in one or more higher-level programming languages such as Python, Java/Scala, Matlab, R or C/C++. Experience with data science techniques, including supervised and/or unsupervised learning approaches. Ability and willingness to travel. Ability to develop independent research projects and publish in peer-reviewed literature. Proficient verbal and written communication skills as reflected in effective presentations at seminars, meetings and/or teaching lectures. Initiative and interpersonal skills with desire and ability to work in a collaborative, multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Collaborate with scientists in a multidisciplinary team environment to accomplish research goals.', ' Ability to develop independent research projects and publish in peer-reviewed literature.', ' Experience applying algorithms in one or more of the following Machine Learning areas/tasks: deep learning, unsupervised feature learning, zero- or few-shot learning, active learning, reinforcement learning, multimodal learning, natural language processing, ensemble methods, scalable online estimation, and probabilistic graphical models.', ' Experience with data science techniques, including supervised and/or unsupervised learning approaches.', 'Essential Duties', ' Pursue independent but complementary research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internally and externally to the Laboratory.']

['', 'Required:\uf0b7 3+ Years professional experience with Python and Bash\uf0b7 Python data structures and best practices\uf0b7 Professional experience with a SQL-based database, such as MySQL\uf0b7 Writes organized code with appropriate exception handling and logging\uf0b7 Understanding of HTTP network requests and responses\uf0b7 Understanding of HTML, XML, and JSON formats\uf0b7 Debugging experience\uf0b7 Ability to write technical documentation and comment code\uf0b7 Ability to write test suites and set up automation environments\uf0b7 Bash scripting\uf0b7 AWS and Linux (Ubuntu/CentOS) ', 'What’s the Job?', 'Required:', 'Plusses:\uf0b7 Amazon Redshift\uf0b7 Hadoop\uf0b7 Prior experience as a front-end, back-end, or full-stack web developer\uf0b7 Javascript / NodeJS\uf0b7 Python Django/Flask', 'What’s the Job?You’ll be joining our data science team as a Data Product Engineer. You’ll be responsible fortesting, monitoring, and improving the data collection programs we have in production, as wellas developing new software to capture data from the web and extract insights from third-partysources. You’ll be writing Python scripts deployed on AWS, and communicating with datascientists and infrastructure engineers. ', 'Data Product Engineer', 'Who Are We?We are an investment firm based in New York, NY. Our data team creates products that play acritical role in our investment decisions. We leverage technology and advanced analyticalmethods to organize, analyze, evaluate and discover new insights. We work in a smallintegrated team. ', 'Who Are We?']

['', 'Quantitative Researcher', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement. ', 'We combine quantitative research, software engineering and rigorous scientific investigation to build credit portfolios that produce strong and consistent yields across business cycles.\xa0\xa0 ', "We are a small team of fewer than 15 with a diversity of ideas and backgrounds applying machine learning, software engineering and rigorous scientific investigation to revamp the lending and securitization space. Every member of the team has a major impact on the company's success, and gets to see their contributions working in the real world. Building good financial forecasting models is extremely challenging from both a technology and research point of view. ", 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. ', 'What you’ll do ', 'Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement. ', 'You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. ', 'What you’ll do', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at Theorem. We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas.', 'Quantitative Researcher ', 'Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. ', 'You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. ', 'You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. ', 'What you bring to the table', 'You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. ', 'What you bring to the table ', 'We are based in San Francisco, close to Caltrain and BART. We deeply value intellectual curiosity, creative idea generation, and close collaboration. We offer above market equity and cash compensation, and generous benefits including paternity and maternity leave policy. ', ' ', 'By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at Theorem. ', 'You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. ', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. ', 'You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. ', 'We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas.']

['', 'We are a small, passionate, and collaborative team -- fewer than 30 research, engineering and finance and operations professionals with a diversity of backgrounds and ideas ', 'We share ideas informally at team lunches, academic paper discussions, and through our bi-weekly All-Hands meetings ', 'Founded in by a Google software engineer and a quant trader, we are backed by some great investors, including Y Combinator and a famous Venture Capital firm. ', "Founded in by a Google software engineer and a quant trader, we are backed by some great investors, including Y Combinator and a famous Venture Capital firm. We are profitable, managing over $800M, including investment from non-profits and university endowments We are a small, passionate, and collaborative team -- fewer than 30 research, engineering and finance and operations professionals with a diversity of backgrounds and ideas Every member of the team has a major impact on the company's success with visible contributions to the business We deeply value intellectual curiosity, creative idea generation, and close collaboration We seek talented individuals who are thoughtful, innovative, tenacious and interested in a mission-focused team environment We share ideas informally at team lunches, academic paper discussions, and through our bi-weekly All-Hands meetings Company events are inclusive and fun, with expeditions to food trucks and Michelin-starred local restaurants, and annual trips to Montana and Stinson Beach featuring hiking and cooking We are located in SoMa in San Francisco, a vigorous 12-minute walk from BART and CalTrain We offer competitive salary and opportunity for equity ownership, generous benefits, and an inclusive and collaborative work environment ", 'Quantitative Researcher', 'An innovative investment fund with over $800 million assets under management, we combine quantitative research, software engineering and rigorous scientific investigation to build credit portfolios that produce strong and consistent yields across business cycles. \xa0 ', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. ', 'We are profitable, managing over $800M, including investment from non-profits and university endowments ', 'You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. ', 'We deeply value intellectual curiosity, creative idea generation, and close collaboration ', 'About us', 'You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. ', 'About us ', 'Company events are inclusive and fun, with expeditions to food trucks and Michelin-starred local restaurants, and annual trips to Montana and Stinson Beach featuring hiking and cooking ', 'What you bring to the table', 'You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. ', 'What you bring to the table ', 'San Francisco, CA ', ' ', 'We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas. ', 'You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. ', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. ['', ' Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus ', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'EEO is the Law', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', ' What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'General office demands', ' Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++ ', ' Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' Design and implement ML pipelines and systems that enable Change Healthcare to train and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective manner  Develop technologies that allow customers to effectively ingest and store patient-related data, and data scientists and engineers to access this data with ease ', ' What other skills/experience would be helpful to have? ', ' Sense of Urgency - bring an agile, let’s get things done attitude ', ' Title: AI Machine Learning Engineer ', 'Interest in learning about foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning ', ' Curious - willing to learn new things and try new things, able to implement prototypes ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. An MS degree is a plus', ' What are the requirements needed for this position? ', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'BS degree in computer science or equivalent background. An MS degree is a plus2+ years professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design, implementation, testing, operations, and maintenance Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java, Python, Scala or C++  Experience working with modern tools for big data processing and scalable machine learning (e.g., AWS, GCP, Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, SQL, NoSQL)  Experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning is a plus  Experience with common machine learning libraries and tools: scikit-learn, MXNet, Tensorflow, XGBoost is a plus Interest in learning about foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, HMM, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning ', 'Communicative - Comfortable presenting to other engineers, share ideas and write specifications and other documentation', ' Experience working with modern tools for big data processing and scalable machine learning (e.g., AWS, GCP, Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, SQL, NoSQL) ', '2+ years professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design, implementation, testing, operations, and maintenance', ' Experience with common machine learning libraries and tools: scikit-learn, MXNet, Tensorflow, XGBoost is a plus ', 'Overview Of Position', ' Curious - willing to learn new things and try new things, able to implement prototypes Communicative - Comfortable presenting to other engineers, share ideas and write specifications and other documentation Sense of Urgency - bring an agile, let’s get things done attitude ', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', ' What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job? ']

['', ' Demonstrated ability to secure sponsor funding through winning proposals and sponsor relationships. Previous experience working Department of Energy, Department of Homeland Security, Department of Defense, or a utility company.', ' Develop, drive, and execute new ideas and approaches to meet the sponsor and project needs.', ' Responsible for ensuring the growth of existing and development of software assurance capabilities at LLNL.', '2020 Best Places to ', 'In Addition, at the SES.5 Level', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', ' Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Ph.D. degree in computer science, computer engineering, or a related field and several years of relevant experience. Experience with the Juliet Test Suite and with industrial control systems software and hardware. Knowledge of one or more of the following computer science disciplines: embedded systems, scientific data analysis, machine learning, systems programming, software engineering, and high performance computing. Demonstrated ability to secure sponsor funding through winning proposals and sponsor relationships. Previous experience working Department of Energy, Department of Homeland Security, Department of Defense, or a utility company.', ' Provide highly innovative solutions to abstract complex problems/ideas, convert them into useable algorithms/software modules, and provide solutions that require in-depth analysis of multiple factors and the creative use of established methods.', ' Expert knowledge of state-of-the-art technologies in software assurance. Extensive experience and demonstrated ability to plan the integration and implementation of new programs and/or operational best practices. Extensive project leadership experience and demonstrated ability to apply, lead and develop cutting-edge principles and research, and work independently while effectively managing concurrent technical tasks with competing priorities.', ' Develop new program growth opportunities through interactions with existing and potential sponsors and the development of research proposals.', ' Master’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, or related field or the equivalent combination of education and significant related experience.', 'Security Clearance: ', ' Subject matter expertise in formal verification methods.', ' Ph.D. degree in computer science, computer engineering, or a related field and several years of relevant experience.', ' Expert knowledge of state-of-the-art technologies in software assurance.', 'Qualifications', ' Provide subject matter expertise in the development new tools for software assurance and analysis for binaries and source code for devices residing in our critical networks and infrastructure.', 'About Us', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', ' Guide and provide scientific and technical direction for a portfolio of highly complex technical tasks and projects that consistently require the application of creativity and innovation; set broad research/project vision and strategy and influence technical direction for Laboratory, self and/or others wielding extensive influence with senior management and policy makers. Provide highly innovative solutions to abstract complex problems/ideas, convert them into useable algorithms/software modules, and provide solutions that require in-depth analysis of multiple factors and the creative use of established methods. Responsible for high-level goal setting, strategic planning, directing and accomplishing project/program goals and objectives significantly impacting major Laboratory programs and contributing to the revolutionary advancement of knowledge.', 'Desired Qualifications', ' Extensive project leadership experience and demonstrated ability to apply, lead and develop cutting-edge principles and research, and work independently while effectively managing concurrent technical tasks with competing priorities.', ' Significant experience effectively leading teams and creating technical direction and vision, writing research proposals and securing sponsor funding.', ' Experience with the Juliet Test Suite and with industrial control systems software and hardware. Knowledge of one or more of the following computer science disciplines: embedded systems, scientific data analysis, machine learning, systems programming, software engineering, and high performance computing.', 'Note: ', ' Master’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, or related field or the equivalent combination of education and significant related experience. Significant experience in highly advanced program analysis of source code, binaries, and firmware. Significant experience with hardware or software debuggers and/or with static disassemblers and decompilers. Subject matter expertise in formal verification methods. Expert knowledge of instruction set architectures, such as ARM, x86/x64, PowerPC and/or MIPS. Experience with advanced firmware extraction from devices. Significant experience effectively leading teams and creating technical direction and vision, writing research proposals and securing sponsor funding. Expert ability to communicate comprehensive knowledge effectively across multi-disciplinary teams and to non-cyber experts, and advise senior management and/or external sponsors, and proficient interpersonal skills necessary to effectively collaborate and lead in a team environment.', 'Work by Glassdoor!', ' Identify new applications and opportunities for and help create vision and technical direction for software assurance capabilities for critical networks and infrastructure cybersecurity working with LLNL’s program leadership.', ' Mentor others and utilize technical expertise to attract and retain projects, programs and funding.', ' Responsible for high-level goal setting, strategic planning, directing and accomplishing project/program goals and objectives significantly impacting major Laboratory programs and contributing to the revolutionary advancement of knowledge.', ' Significant experience with hardware or software debuggers and/or with static disassemblers and decompilers.', ' Expert knowledge of instruction set architectures, such as ARM, x86/x64, PowerPC and/or MIPS.', ' Expert ability to communicate comprehensive knowledge effectively across multi-disciplinary teams and to non-cyber experts, and advise senior management and/or external sponsors, and proficient interpersonal skills necessary to effectively collaborate and lead in a team environment.', ' Lead and support a diverse range of highly complex research projects requiring creative use of innovative methods for development and implementation of new, automated software assurance tools. Responsible for ensuring the growth of existing and development of software assurance capabilities at LLNL. Provide subject matter expertise in the development new tools for software assurance and analysis for binaries and source code for devices residing in our critical networks and infrastructure. Identify new applications and opportunities for and help create vision and technical direction for software assurance capabilities for critical networks and infrastructure cybersecurity working with LLNL’s program leadership. Develop new program growth opportunities through interactions with existing and potential sponsors and the development of research proposals. Develop, drive, and execute new ideas and approaches to meet the sponsor and project needs. Mentor others and utilize technical expertise to attract and retain projects, programs and funding. Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Lead and support a diverse range of highly complex research projects requiring creative use of innovative methods for development and implementation of new, automated software assurance tools.', ' Guide and provide scientific and technical direction for a portfolio of highly complex technical tasks and projects that consistently require the application of creativity and innovation; set broad research/project vision and strategy and influence technical direction for Laboratory, self and/or others wielding extensive influence with senior management and policy makers.', ' Experience with advanced firmware extraction from devices.', ' Significant experience in highly advanced program analysis of source code, binaries, and firmware.', 'Essential Duties', ' Extensive experience and demonstrated ability to plan the integration and implementation of new programs and/or operational best practices.']

['', "You'll need to have:", 'Experience with distributed computational frameworks (Kubernetes, Spark, Hadoop, etc)- Financial experience/knowledge a plus, but not required- Leadership experience building out teams in comparable areas ', 'Publish such findings, present at conferences, and represent the company in the industry ', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field A strong quantitative background (Probability Theory, Statistics, Linear Algebra, etc.)- Experience in model evaluation, feature engineering, and time series analytics A track record of relevant research- 3+ years experience applying these skills 3+ years of experience programming in C++, Python, or Java ', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field ', "Machine Learning Engineer – EquitiesNew York, NY - USA\xa0For over 30 years, our clients have relied on our core product to access the data and analytics they need to make informed investment decisions. We absorb billions of data points from hundreds of financial markets every single day. Our teams build applications that fuel the markets by providing intelligent analytics and transparency to level the playing field. We share a real passion for solving today’s problems by innovating for tomorrow.\xa0We're building a new team, starting small, with researchers and engineers, whose goal is to leverage modern data science to enhance and extend our firm’s Equities suite of functionality. We will be working closely with product designers to understand how we could improve or optimize their products, including feature engineering, improved relevancy metrics, sentiment extraction, and more. We also intend to actively pursue research in the domain, publish papers, attend conferences, and represent the company in the industry.\xa0We leverage modern open source tools and will also work closely with an existing, dedicated team of infrastructure developers for big-data and distributed analytics. Our ultimate goals are new, novel applications of data science in the equity domain and making such analysis easy and quick for our clients.\xa0We'll trust you to: ", 'Work with a team of Data Scientists & developers to design, experiment, and evaluate models ', 'A track record of relevant research- 3+ years experience applying these skills ', "We'd love to see:", "We'll trust you to:", 'Experience in Deep Learning methods and their applications ', 'A strong quantitative background (Probability Theory, Statistics, Linear Algebra, etc.)- Experience in model evaluation, feature engineering, and time series analytics ', 'Write, test, and maintain production-quality code implementing these methods ', 'Actively pursue research in the area of equities and data science ', 'Collaborate closely with product designers on best uses of quantitative DS methods in new & existing products Work with a team of Data Scientists & developers to design, experiment, and evaluate models Actively pursue research in the area of equities and data science Publish such findings, present at conferences, and represent the company in the industry Write, test, and maintain production-quality code implementing these methods ', 'Machine Learning Engineer – Equities', 'Experience in Deep Learning methods and their applications Experience with distributed computational frameworks (Kubernetes, Spark, Hadoop, etc)- Financial experience/knowledge a plus, but not required- Leadership experience building out teams in comparable areas ', '3+ years of experience programming in C++, Python, or Java ', 'Collaborate closely with product designers on best uses of quantitative DS methods in new & existing products ']

job_title: Computation-Focused High Temperature Alloy Design - Postdoctoral Researcher
job_text: ['', ' Understand and elucidate high-temperature strengthening mechanisms in RHEAs.', ' PhD in materials science, condensed matter physics, applied math, or a related field. Experience and knowledge in at least two of the following areas: alloy mechanical property prediction, phase-field modeling, dislocation modeling, numerical optimization, HEA science. Ability to independently develop massively parallelized codes using Fortran, C/C++, Python, and advanced numerical solvers. Experience with numerical methods for solving partial differential equations such as finite difference, finite element, and/or spectral methods. Knowledge of alloy metallurgy, including thermodynamics / phase stability, phase transformations, defect structure and kinetics. Proficient verbal and written communication skills as reflected in effective presentations at meetings and a demonstrated strong publication record. Initiative and interpersonal skills with desire and ability to work in a collaborative, multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Experience and knowledge in at least two of the following areas: alloy mechanical property prediction, phase-field modeling, dislocation modeling, numerical optimization, HEA science.', '2020 Best Places to ', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', ' PhD in materials science, condensed matter physics, applied math, or a related field.', ' Experience with numerical methods for solving partial differential equations such as finite difference, finite element, and/or spectral methods.', ' Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Ability to independently develop massively parallelized codes using Fortran, C/C++, Python, and advanced numerical solvers.', ' Propose, develop, and integrate solid-solution strengthening models (e.g. mechanistic / analytical and machine learning-based) for HEAs into LLNL’s alloy design framework (Materials Design Simulator).', 'Security Clearance: ', 'Qualifications', ' Experience in alloy design.', ' Propose, develop, and integrate solid-solution strengthening models (e.g. mechanistic / analytical and machine learning-based) for HEAs into LLNL’s alloy design framework (Materials Design Simulator). Develop, verify, validate, and maintain a phase-field crystal simulation code for HEAs on LLNL supercomputers. Understand and elucidate high-temperature strengthening mechanisms in RHEAs. Generate and maintain a database of phase stability and mechanical properties for HEAs. Interface with experimentalists to validate models and propose directions and guidance for RHEA property optimization. Work both independently and collaborate with others in a multidisciplinary team environment to accomplish program goals. Publish research results in peer-reviewed scientific or technical journals and present results at external conferences, seminars, and/or technical meetings. Perform other duties as assigned.', 'About Us', ' Work both independently and collaborate with others in a multidisciplinary team environment to accomplish program goals.', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Note: ', ' Publish research results in peer-reviewed scientific or technical journals and present results at external conferences, seminars, and/or technical meetings.', ' Develop, verify, validate, and maintain a phase-field crystal simulation code for HEAs on LLNL supercomputers.', 'Work by Glassdoor!', ' Experience in crystal plasticity / solid mechanics constitutive modeling and/or density functional theory and/or molecular dynamics.', ' Experience in alloy design. Experience with machine learning methods and/or uncertainty quantification and propagation. Experience in crystal plasticity / solid mechanics constitutive modeling and/or density functional theory and/or molecular dynamics.', ' Proficient verbal and written communication skills as reflected in effective presentations at meetings and a demonstrated strong publication record.', ' Experience with machine learning methods and/or uncertainty quantification and propagation.', ' Knowledge of alloy metallurgy, including thermodynamics / phase stability, phase transformations, defect structure and kinetics.', 'Essential Duties', ' Initiative and interpersonal skills with desire and ability to work in a collaborative, multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Generate and maintain a database of phase stability and mechanical properties for HEAs.', ' Interface with experimentalists to validate models and propose directions and guidance for RHEA property optimization.']

job_title: Machine Learning Research Scientist - Pattern Recognition
job_text: [' Drive projects as the principle point-of-contact, with the ability to determine and elaborate on suitable metrics as well as methods  Write, test, and maintain production-quality code (mainly C++)  Publish papers and attend conferences in leading venues representing our Research  ', 'Drive projects as the principle point-of-contact, with the ability to determine and elaborate on suitable metrics as well as methods ', "With the ever-increasing amount of data being generated, our clients need ever more sophisticated ways of extracting signal from noise. The Pattern Recognition team in the Machine Learning group is responsible for building a wide variety of analytics and recommendation systems to surface insights (e.g., identify market moving news stories, create new events that are relevant to users, provide personalized recommendations of events to users, etc.) to increase our client's productivity. ", "You'll need to have:", ' State of the art deep learning (e.g., hyper-parameter tuning, sequence-to-sequence methods, word/entity embeddings, CNNs, etc.)  Model evaluation  Feature engineering  Big data experience  Familiarly with time series analytics  ', 'Write, test, and maintain production-quality code (mainly C++) ', 'Machine Learning Research Scientist - Pattern Recognition\xa0', "We'll trust you to:", 'A track record of relevant research ', 'Familiarly with time series analytics ', 'Machine Learning Research Scientist - Pattern Recognition\xa0 ', "You'll need to have: ", 'Big data experience ', 'Experience with a deep learning framework (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, CNTK, etc.) is helpful ', 'We ingests more than 1.5 million news stories per day from more than 120,000 different sources to help our clients stay in the know. This data would be unmanageable without our help. News stories move markets. We build machines that understand them. ', 'Experience with NLP is also very useful', 'Solid background in machine learning and/or statistics, publication history ', 'Strong computer science fundamentals (algorithms, data structures) ', 'State of the art deep learning (e.g., hyper-parameter tuning, sequence-to-sequence methods, word/entity embeddings, CNNs, etc.) ', ' Strong computer science fundamentals (algorithms, data structures)  A track record of relevant research  Solid background in machine learning and/or statistics, publication history  Experience with a deep learning framework (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, CNTK, etc.) is helpful  Experience with NLP is also very useful', "We'll trust you to: ", ' ', 'We are looking for research scientists with experience running a machine learning project from inception to completion, and specifically with a background and interest in one or more of the following areas: ', 'Feature engineering ', 'Publish papers and attend conferences in leading venues representing our Research ', 'Model evaluation ']
